source: Title: 星洲炒米粉, Ingredients: 3卷星洲炒米专用米粉 1520只鲜虾 大半个洋葱 一小根胡萝卜 35个青椒 1大根火腿肠 适量蒜末大葱段干辣椒 适量咖喱粉 适量盐 适量食用油 适量蚝油, Steps: 以上是所需要的食材 一定要用到咖喱粉，一般超市都买得到，不能用咖喱块代替 米粉我是在网上买的专门做星洲炒米的粉，这种粉比一般的粉丝有弹性也韧一些，炒的时候没那么容易断。记得要提前用冷水泡1015分钟 1锅烧热加少量油，小火煸炒葱段蒜末和干辣椒 煸出香味后倒入处理好的虾仁 虾仁炒成红色就倒入洋葱胡萝卜和青椒丝一起煸炒几分钟。 蔬菜稍微炒软就加入火腿肠，再加少量盐和咖喱粉打个底味。炒蔬菜的时候可以稍微点一点热水更好熟 蔬菜基本都熟了就把事先泡好并沥去水分的粉丝倒入锅中一起炒，炒粉的时候沿着锅四周加入适量的油防止粘锅 粉丝炒23分钟就好，之后就可以开始调味了，先加入适量蚝油 根据自己的口味加适量的盐 最后加稍微多一点的咖喱粉 完成 黄灿灿的看着就好吃
references: Title: Singapore Noodles, Ingredients: 1 lb ground pork (or beef or poultry) 5 garlic cloves, minced 3 teaspoons ground ginger 1/4 teaspoon cayenne 1 1/2 tablespoons curry powder 1/3 cup green onion, slivered (or chopped) 1/4 cup oyster sauce 2 teaspoons soy sauce 1 lb spaghetti, Steps: In a wok or large frying pan, scramble-fry pork with garlic, ginger, cayenne, curry, and green onion. (If you're not using lean meat, you may want to partially cook the meat by itself and then drain most of the fat before adding the other ingredients.). Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Add oyster sauce and soy sauce to meat mixture and toss well to mix thoroughly. Drain spaghetti and add to meat. Toss to mix and serve.
prediction: Title: Szechuan Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 onion, finely chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 tablespoon minced fresh gingerroot 2 tablespoons minced fresh cilantro 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon rice wine vinegar 1 tablespoon sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground red pepper 1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1/4 cup chopped green bell pepper 2 cups cooked white rice 1/2 cup chopped green onion, Steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic; saute 3 minutes or until tender. Stir in ginger, cilantro, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, salt, red pepper flakes, green onion, and rice wine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer, uncovered, 5 minutes or until rice is tender. Remove from heat; stir in green onion.

source: Title: 玉米鸡蛋羹, Ingredients: 鸡蛋 热水 玉米 腊肉 一小勺盐, Steps: 将鸡蛋打入容器中，不用太深的碗哦。 将鸡蛋顺着一个方向打成液体，按照鸡蛋液和热水的比例1：2，加入热水和少量食盐，搅拌均匀，也是按着同一个方向。 盖上保鲜膜。 放入蒸锅中蒸大概十分钟，郭盖不要盖严，留一个口。出锅即可。
references: Title: Chinese Chicken Corn Soup, Ingredients: 3 c. canned chicken broth 1 (8 3/4 oz.) can creamed corn 1 c. cooked skinned chicken, diced 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 2 Tbsp. cold water 2 egg whites 2 Tbsp. finely minced fresh parsley, Steps: Combine chicken broth, corn and chicken in large saucepan. Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Blend cornstarch with cold water and add to soup. Continue cooking, uncovered, for 3 minutes. Beat egg whites until foamy; stir into soup. Reduce heat and cook until foam is gone. Garnish with parsley. Serve hot. One cup serving has 156 calories.
prediction: Title: Cornish Eggs, Ingredients: 1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 c. cornflakes cereal, Steps: In a small bowl, cream butter and onion until light and fluffy. Stir in green pepper, salt and pepper. Stir in cereal; mix well. Shape into 1-inch balls. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 15 to 18 minutes or until golden brown. Yields 6 dozen.

source: Title: 鸡肉蘑菇炒面, Ingredients: 四个蘑菇 半块鸡胸 适量酱油 四片白菜 一只鸡蛋, Steps: 面煮好，过凉水 鸡胸肉切丁，和打碎的鸡蛋放在一起 蘑菇和白菜切碎 炒鸡蛋和鸡胸，直至都变色可以放入蘑菇和白菜，加入盐和生抽 放面，再加一点生抽，炒熟出锅
references: Title: Chicken Chow Mein, Ingredients: 2 c. cooked chicken 1 can cream of mushroom soup 1 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 celery stalks, chopped 1 (3 oz.) can chow mein noodles 3 Tbsp. onion, chopped, Steps: Combine all ingredients and half can of noodles. Mix well. Place in square baking dish. Sprinkle remaining noodles on top. Bake at 350° for 50 minutes.
prediction: Title: Chicken And Mushroom Noodles, Ingredients: 1 lb. boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1-inch cubes 2 Tbsp. butter 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms 1/4 c. chopped celery 1/4 c. minced green pepper 1/4 c. all-purpose flour 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. chicken broth 1/4 c. water 1/4 c. soy sauce 1/4 c. dry sherry, Steps: In a large skillet, saute chicken in butter until no longer pink. Stir in onion, mushrooms, celery and green pepper. Combine flour, salt and pepper; gradually add broth and water. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in soy sauce and sherry. Return chicken to skillet; heat through. Yields 4 servings.

source: Title: 西红柿炒鸡蛋, Ingredients: 2个西红柿 2个鸡蛋, Steps: 两个鸡蛋，加适量料酒和盐，打散 西红柿洗净后切小块儿，去蒂 小葱洗净切段 热锅，放油，加入鸡蛋，待底部成型，用铲子将鸡蛋划散，关火盛出 开火，放油，加入葱段爆香，放入西红柿，快速翻炒，等西红柿出汁，断生，再加入鸡蛋翻炒，让鸡蛋糊上一层西红柿汁最好，最后加入适量盐翻炒几下出锅。
references: Title: Stir Fry Tomato And Eggs, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 6 eggs, beaten 1 green onion, chopped 2 large tomatoes, cut into thin wedges salt to taste, Steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. When the oil is hot, add the eggs, and green onion; cook and stir until the eggs are almost solid. Add the tomatoes, and cook until eggs are firm. Season with salt, and serve.
prediction: Title: Scrambled Eggs And Tomatoes, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 small onion, finely chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 4 large eggs, lightly beaten 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, Steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and oregano and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in the salt and pepper. Add the eggs and cook, stirring constantly, until the eggs are just set, about 3 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper. Transfer the eggs to a large baking dish. Bake until the eggs are set, about 15 minutes.

source: Title: 扬州炒饭, Ingredients: 半根胡萝卜 两个鸡蛋 半根黄瓜 小半个紫皮圆葱 半根秋林红肠, Steps: 紫皮圆葱、黄瓜、红肠切小丁，胡萝卜切沫，备用 鸡蛋打散，用筷子高速搅打几下至出沫，下油锅炒散，盛出来，备用。炒的时候趁蛋液未凝固快速翻动锅铲，这样炒出来的蛋比较散。 起锅另放油，放入圆葱小火煸至圆葱酥黄，葱香四溢，加入胡萝卜和黄瓜丁翻炒，炒至黄瓜变色呈透明状，即可加入米饭。 待米饭炒匀，加入红肠和炒好的鸡蛋，翻炒几下，加盐调味即可出锅。小馋孩一口气吃了满满两碗，彻底打乱了我让他减肥的计划
references: Title: Yang Chow Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons canola oil, divided 4 large eggs, lightly beaten and divided 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, divided Dash of salt 1 3/4 cups thinly sliced green onions, divided 2 teaspoons grated peeled fresh ginger 2 garlic cloves, minced 5 cups cooked short-grain rice, chilled 1/4 cup lower-sodium soy sauce {Check for Gluten} 1/2 teaspoon salt 1 (10-ounce) package frozen green peas, thawed 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, Steps: Heat 2 teaspoons oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add half of eggs; swirl to coat bottom of pan evenly. Sprinkle with 1/8 teaspoon pepper and dash of salt; cook 3 minutes or until egg is done. Remove egg from pan; thinly slice, and set aside. Wipe pan clean with a paper towel. Heat remaining 4 teaspoons oil in pan over medium-high heat. Add 1 cup onions, ginger, and garlic; stir-fry 30 seconds. Add remaining eggs and rice; stir-fry 3 minutes. Stir in half of reserved egg strips, remaining 3/4 cup onions, remaining 1/8 teaspoon pepper, soy sauce, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and peas; cook 30 seconds, stirring well to combine. Top with remaining egg strips and cilantro. Chilling the cooked rice is the key to making delicious fried rice. Allowing the rice to chill overnight (or at least for a few hours) helps eliminate excess moisture, keeping the grains firm and separate. If you use hot, freshly cooked rice, you're likely to end up with mushier results.
prediction: Title: Chinese Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 onion, diced 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon ginger, minced 2 teaspoons sesame oil 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 2 cups cooked white rice 1 cup frozen peas, thawed 1/2 cup bean sprouts, Steps: Heat oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic; stir-fry 3 minutes or until tender. Stir in ginger, sesame oil, salt and pepper. Add rice and peas; toss to coat. Cover and cook 5 minutes or until rice is heated through.

source: Title: 皮蛋瘦肉粥, Ingredients: 适量大米 适量瘦肉 适量皮蛋 适量姜 适量葱 适量胡椒粉, Steps: 大米洗净，用保鲜袋放在冰箱冷冻层。冷冻2小时以上，也可提前一晚放入，第二天早上取出。 猪肉切成丝，用盐、胡椒粉、食用油、淀粉搅拌均匀，用保鲜袋放入冰箱冷藏层，冷藏时长和大米一致。 皮蛋切块，姜切片。用保鲜袋放入冰箱冷藏层，冷藏时长与大米一致。 锅中沸水，放入冷冻的大米，熬制10分钟后，放入姜片，逐条放入肉丝，搅拌均匀后，再放入皮蛋，继续搅拌2分钟左右，即可出锅。盛入碗中后，可放入少许葱花。
references: Title: Congee, Ingredients: 5 cups chicken stock 5 cups water 1 cup white rice 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar 2 tablespoons fish sauce 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon sesame oil 2 (6 ounce) fillets lean white fish, sliced 1/4 cup pickled Chinese vegetables 1/4 cup sliced Chinese roast pork 2 tablespoons chopped scallions 2 tablespoons crushed peanuts 1/2 teaspoon vinegar, or to taste 1/2 teaspoon soy sauce, or to taste, Steps: Combine chicken stock, water, rice, 1/4 cup apple cider vinegar, fish sauce, ginger, salt, and sesame oil in a large stockpot; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until congee has thickened to the consistency of a light porridge, about 3 hours. Stir fish into congee and simmer until cooked through, about 10 minutes. Serve congee in bowls topped with pickled vegetables, roast pork, scallions, and peanuts. Drizzle 1/2 teaspoon vinegar and soy sauce over toppings.
prediction: Title: Crunchy Porridge, Ingredients: 2 cups water 1 cup uncooked long grain rice 1/2 cup chopped onion 1/2 cup chopped celery 1/2 cup chopped carrot 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1/4 cup chopped pecans, Steps: In a large saucepan, combine the water, rice, onion, celery, carrot, salt, pepper, nutmeg and pecans. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until rice is tender. Stir in pecans.

source: Title: 鸡丝凉面, Ingredients: 1只鸡腿 1条黄瓜 3两鲜手工面 适量辣椒油 适量麻酱 适量姜蒜泥 少许糖 适量酱油 适量醋 少许花椒油 少许葱花 适量葱段 适量生姜 少许料酒 少许八角 适量油, Steps: 鸡腿退冰洗净，在冷锅中放入少许料酒，八角、生姜、葱段，加适量水，大火烧开后转中小火炖煮20分钟后将鸡腿捞出，放凉后手撕成鸡丝备用。 黄瓜切丝。 煮面条：在锅中加入少许盐，水沸后将面条下入，煮至9分熟沥水捞起，过凉水可饮用的纯净水，加入适量的油将面条拌匀，用风扇吹凉会摊开晾凉。 调味：底部码上黄瓜丝，放入适量面条和鸡丝，辣椒油视个人吃辣程度添加，淋上少许麻酱，加入适量姜蒜泥、酱油、醋，少许糖和香油，搅拌均匀即可食用。
references: Title: Asian Chicken Noodle Salad, Ingredients: 1 head small cabbage, shredded 1 red bell pepper, thinly sliced 4 (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 4 tablespoons sesame seeds 1 lb cooked diced chicken, cold 3 tablespoons brown sugar 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/3 cup rice vinegar 1/4 cup sesame oil 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger 1/4 teaspoon red pepper flakes 1 garlic clove, minced 5 green onions, chopped (top half tossed out), Steps: Mix up all ingredients except cabbage, sesame seeds, vegetable oil and chicken to make dressing. Break ramen noodles into 4 pieces per package, toss out flavoring packages. Boil for 2 minutes only, no longer! Drain, and rinse with cool water until cold. While still in colander, toss with vegetable oil. Combine cabbage, pepper, sesame seeds, noodles, chicken and dressing just prior to serving.
prediction: Title: Asian Chicken Noodles, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1/2 pound boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 1/2 cup thinly sliced green onions 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro 1 tablespoon minced peeled fresh ginger 1 garlic clove, minced 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/4 cup reduced-sodium soy sauce 2 tablespoons rice wine vinegar 1 tablespoon sesame oil 2 tablespoons minced fresh gingerroot 1 tablespoon grated peeled fresh ginger 2 teaspoons grated lime zest 1/4 cup chopped seeded jalapeno pepper 1/4 cup chopped green onions 2 tablespoons chopped seeded jalepenos, Steps: Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook 4 minutes or until browned, stirring occasionally. Add green onions, cilantro, ginger, garlic, salt, and pepper; cook 3 minutes or until onions are tender. Stir in soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, ginger, lime zest, jalapenos, and jalapenos; cook 1 minute or until thoroughly heated. Stir in green onions.

source: Title: 葱爆牛肉, Ingredients: 200克牛肉 1根大葱 2瓣蒜 2片姜 1勺淀粉 2勺生抽 1勺料酒 适量蒜苗, Steps: 牛肉切片加料酒、生抽、淀粉喂好 大葱切丝、酱切丝、蒜切末 热锅冷油，加葱姜蒜爆锅，加喂好的牛肉 迅速翻拌将牛肉炒透 加入大葱翻炒 加入蒜苗 翻炒 出锅装盘
references: Title: Beef and Scallion Stir-Fry, Ingredients: 3/4 cup water 2 tablespoons hoisin sauce 2 tablespoons rice-wine vinegar (unseasoned) 1 tablespoon cornstarch Coarse salt 1/2 teaspoon crushed red-pepper flakes, plus more for serving (optional) 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon vegetable oil, such as safflower 1 1/4 pounds flank steak, cut diagonally across the grain into 1/2-by-3-inch strips 4 garlic cloves, minced 2 bunches scallions, trimmed, sliced crosswise 1 1/2 inches thick, white and green parts separated Cooked rice, for serving (optional), Steps: In a small bowl, whisk together the water, hoisin sauce, vinegar, cornstarch, 3/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon red-pepper flakes. Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet over high. Pat-dry steak with paper towels. In two batches, cook steak until lightly browned, turning once, about 2 minutes per batch. Transfer meat to a plate. Add remaining teaspoon oil to skillet along with garlic and white parts of scallions. Cook, tossing often, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Whisk hoisin mixture to combine; add to pan along with scallion greens. Return meat to pan; cook, tossing to coat steak with sauce, 1 minute. Remove from heat. Serve immediately over rice and sprinkled with more red-pepper flakes, as desired.
prediction: Title: Onion Beef, Ingredients: 2 lb. beef chuck, cut into 1-inch cubes 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 1 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. chopped celery 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1/4 c. minced parsley 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper, Steps: In skillet, brown meat in oil. Add onion, celery, green pepper, parsley, salt and pepper. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover and cook 5 minutes longer or until meat is tender. Yields 4 servings.

source: Title: 凉拌豆芽, Ingredients: 把豆芽 勺胡萝卜 粒菠菜 克盐 瓣醋 勺凉拌汁 根葱姜蒜 胡椒粉 香油, Steps: 1豆芽，红萝卜丝，菠菜，用开水过一下。捞出来放盆里。2蒜泥，姜沫，大葱放在上面，用热油浇一下。3一勺半盐，一勺凉拌汁，一勺醋，一勺芝麻香油，一勺胡椒粉。拌开即可。绿豆芽也是同样的。
references: Title: Bean Sprout Salad, Ingredients: 2 lb. fresh bean sprouts 1 kettle boiling water 3 Tbsp. finely chopped scallions 3 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 Tbsp. sesame oil 1 Tbsp. sugar 1 Tbsp. vinegar 1 Tbsp. toasted sesame seed chopped red pepper, fresh or dried to taste, Steps: Rinse bean sprouts, removing any green shells that may be left. Place in large colander and pour boiling water over sprouts to blanch. Combine remaining ingredients and mix with sprouts. Serve warm or cold.
prediction: Title: Creamy Bean Sprouts, Ingredients: 1/2 lb. bacon, cut into 1/2-inch pieces 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1 clove garlic, minced 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/4 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. water 1/4 c. sour cream, Steps: Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Remove bacon from skillet; crumble. Add onion and green pepper; cook and stir until tender. Stir in garlic and butter. Stir in flour, salt and pepper until blended. Gradually add milk, stirring until smooth. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Stir in sour cream. Serve immediately. Makes 6 servings.

source: Title: 麻婆豆腐, Ingredients: 1块豆腐 100g肉馅 3根蒜苗 1勺豆豉 2大勺郫县豆瓣 1勺油辣子 适量淀粉 少许生抽 少许料酒 1小撮白糖 少许花椒粉, Steps: 肉馅加少许生抽，少许淀粉搅拌均匀。热锅凉油倒入肉馅，迅速炒散，小火炒干水气，倒入少许开水继续炒干点，起锅备用。 豆腐切成小块，放入开水锅，舀入少许盐焯水，水开后煮两分钟，沥水盛入盘中待用。 热锅热油，倒入郫县豆瓣酱，小火炒出红油，大约用时1分钟，舀入油辣子，再倒入事先剁碎的豆豉，继续炒香，30秒，加入开水熬1分钟。 倒入豆腐块，煮大约两分钟，其间推动豆腐，使其与汤汁融合，后放入蒜苗段，蒜苗段事先切好，蒜苗头斜切，蒜苗叶直切，都切成2厘米长。 再加入之前炒的肉绍，轻轻地推动锅里的材料，可以尝尝咸淡，酌情增添盐。倒入1勺料酒在锅里，放一点点白糖提鲜只要一点点，尝不出甜味 最后勾薄芡，烧一分把钟就大功告成了。 上桌前撒点花椒面在豆腐上。
references: Title: Mapo Tofu, Ingredients: 1 garlic clove, minced 1/4 lb ground pork (optional) or 1/4 lb ground chicken (optional) 2 tablespoons spicy bean paste 2 teaspoons chili powder 2 teaspoons light soy sauce 12 1/3 ounces silken tofu (preferably firm or extra-firm) 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 tablespoon chili oil 1 tablespoon black bean garlic sauce 1 leek, ends trimmed, sliced and rinsed 1/2 cup low sodium chicken broth or 1/2 cup vegetable broth 1 1/2 teaspoons cornstarch 1 1/2 - 2 tablespoons szechuan peppercorns, ground, Steps: Combine garlic, spicy bean paste, chili powder, soy sauce, black bean garlic sauce and (optionally) meat. Cut the tofu into 1/2 to 3/4-inch cubes. Heat a wok or large skillet over high heat and add the vegetable and chili oil. When the oil is very hot and starting to smoke, add the ground meat or seasoning mixture and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes with meat, 30-60 seconds without. Add the leek and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes. Stir the cornstarch into the broth and add to the wok along with the tofu. Stir gently until thoroughly combined. Lower the heat and simmer for 3-4 minutes. Turn off the heat. Add in the ground Szechuan peppercorns, stir gently, and allow to cook in the residual heat for another 1-2 minutes. Serve hot over white rice.
prediction: Title: Tofu, Ingredients: 1 lb. firm tofu, drained and cut into 1/2-inch cubes 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese, Steps: In a skillet, melt butter. Add onion and green pepper; cook and stir until tender. Stir in salt, pepper and Parmesan cheese. Cook and stir until cheese is melted and mixture is heated through. Makes 4 servings.

source: Title: 鱼香肉丝, Ingredients: 盐, Steps: 主料：里脊肉木耳冬笋胡萝卜辅料：香菜葱蒜调料：糖鸡粉香油海鲜酱油郫县豆瓣酱花椒粉陈醋第一步：备料胡萝卜切丝香菜切段冬笋切丝木耳切丝里脊肉切丝葱切葱花蒜切片第二步：腌制肉丝肉丝放入容器中加入料酒加入香油海鲜酱油鸡粉水淀粉抓匀第三步：滑油锅中烧油下入肉丝滑油第四步：炒制锅中留底油下入葱蒜郫县豆瓣酱花椒粉胡萝卜木耳冬笋明油肉丝海鲜酱油鸡粉糖陈醋香菜炒匀盛盘
references: Title: Boiled Pork With Garlic Sauce, Ingredients: 2 pounds pork roast 5 Boston lettuce leaves 3 scallions cut into halves 5 slices ginger root 1 tablespoon garlic grated 4 tablespoons soy sauce 2 teaspoons sugar 1 tablespoon rice vinegar 1/4 teaspoon chili oil 2 teaspoons sesame oil, Steps: 1. Put the meat in a saucepan. Add water, enough to cover the meat. Add sliced ginger and scallions, too. Boil it about 40-50 minutes (until well done). 2. Cool the meat and thinly slice. 3. Make sauce. Mix all ingredients. 4. Put the lettuce leaves on the plate, then put on the sliced pork. Serve with sauce. Serves 4.

source: Title: 酸菜猪肉饺子, Ingredients: 克酸菜500 克五花肉500 毫升面粉750 根葱半根 适量姜 适量盐 适量生抽, Steps: 猪肉馅是自己绞的，肥肉和瘦肉大概5比4，因酸菜油大会更好吃一些，特增加了一些荤油。 酸菜是买袋装的，里面是已经切好的酸菜丝，自己再剁比较容易。葱姜切末，荤油起锅，放入葱姜末炒出香味关火，待锅凉一些放入猪肉馅搅拌均匀，再把酸菜末挤出多余水分和肉馅搅拌，放入适量的盐和生抽调味。 面粉我买的是高筋面粉，对和面技术不好的朋友高筋面粉可是避免煮饺子时变成片汤的尴尬，我自己经验，每次可以多包一些放入饺子盒冰箱冷冻。 热气腾腾的酸菜猪肉馅饺子出锅啦
references: Title: Pork And Sauerkraut With Dumplings, Ingredients: 3 -4 lbs fresh pork 1 large onion salt and pepper 1 quart sauerkraut Dumplings 2 cups flour 3 teaspoons baking powder 1 teaspoon salt 3 tablespoons butter, melted 1 cup milk, Steps: Rub pork with salt and pepper. references: Title: Liver With Peppers And Onions, Ingredients: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1 pound liver, cut into bite-size pieces 1 large onion, thinly sliced into rings 1 medium green pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces 1 sweet red pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces 4 tablespoons canola oil, divided 1 tablespoon cornstarch 1 cup beef broth 2 tablespoons soy sauce Cooked rice or noodles, Steps: In a large bowl or resealable plastic bag, combine the flour, salt and pepper. source: Title: 简单盐焗鸡, Ingredients: 适量姜 一包盐焗鸡粉 半只鸡 适量蒜, Steps: 买三黄鸡半只，洗净 抹上盐焗鸡粉，腌制10-30分钟，而我腌的比较久，腌了一个下午 电饭锅放入蒜和姜，我家里的电饭锅总是会焗得蒜和姜都糊了，不知道别家会不会糊 把腌制好的鸡放电饭锅里，按下煮饭键就好了，我的是煮一次后翻身再煮一次，避免鸡肉不熟 美味的盐焗鸡就做好了，虽然颜值不怎么样，味道还是不错的
references: Title: Salt-Baked Chicken, Ingredients: About 4 pounds kosher salt 1 4-pound chicken, Steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Put the salt in a heavy pot with a lid, slightly larger than the chicken. Place the pot, uncovered, over medium heat until the salt is very hot, stirring from time to time, about 30 minutes. Scoop most of the salt into a large bowl, leaving a 1 1/2-to-2-inch layer of salt in the bottom of the pot. Place the chicken over the salt layer, breast side up. Spoon the remaining salt over and around the chicken, so that it is completely buried in salt. Cover the pot with the lid. Bake until the chicken is cooked through, about 1 1/2 hours. Scrape the salt from the chicken and remove from the pot. Wipe off as much of the salt as possible and let stand for 10 minutes. Carve the chicken and serve.

source: Title: 蚝油芥蓝, Ingredients: 250克芥蓝去老叶，长度在12-15厘米 12克热水 1克淀粉 35克蚝油 3克酱油 2克糖 3克麻油, Steps: 芥蓝洗净，将叶，茎交叉迭放，用保鲜膜包紧。 把包好的芥蓝放入合适的微波耐热容器中，放入烹饪箱第0层上，选择微波1000烹煮2分30秒，取出，迅速用冷水冲洗一下，沥干，切成6-7厘米长的条状，置盘。 另取一个微波耐热容器，把所有调味料放入拌匀，放入烹饪箱第0层，选择微波1000爆香1分钟后，取出，淋于菜上，即成。烹饪程序烹饪程序：微波1000放置层数：微波耐热容器，第0层烹饪时间：3分30秒烹饪容器：微波耐热容器
references: Title: Chinese Broccoli With Oyster Sauce, Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds Chinese or regular broccoli 1 teaspoon salt, divided 1 tablespoon canola oil 1 tablespoon peeled, minced fresh ginger 2 tablespoons oyster sauce 1/2 teaspoon granulated sugar 2 teaspoons toasted sesame oil, Steps: If using Chinese broccoli, trim 1/2 inch from bottoms of stalks; discard. (Stalks more than 1/2 inch in diameter should be halved lengthwise.) Slice stalks into 2 1/2 x 1/4-inch sticks. (With regular broccoli, just use the florets.) Combine 6 cups water and 1/2 teaspoon salt in a large pot over high heat; bring to a boil. Add the broccoli stalks (or florets); blanch 2 minutes. Remove and drain in a colander. Add the leaves to the pot; blanch 1 minute. Drain broccoli in a colander. Heat the canola oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ginger; stir-fry 15 seconds. Add broccoli, remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt, oyster sauce, and sugar; stir-fry 1 1/2 minutes, or until broccoli is crisp-tender. Remove from heat; drizzle with sesame oil.

references: Title: Tiger Salad (, Ingredients: 3 celery ribs (5 ounces; 140g), preferably cut from closer to the heart, 1/2 long hot green pepper (1/2 ounce; 14g), split in half, each half then cut on a bias (see note) 2 scallions, sliced thinly on a bias (2 ounces; 56g) 1 small bunch cilantro leaves and tender stems, torn by hand or chopped into 3-inch lengths (1 ounce; 28g) 1 tablespoon (15ml) rice vinegar 3/4 teaspoon Diamond Crystal kosher salt; if using table salt, use half as much by volume 3/4 teaspoon sugar 1/4 teaspoon soy sauce 1 teaspoon sesame oil 2 tablespoons (0.2 ounce; 6g); see note, Steps: In a medium mixing bowl, combine celery, long hot green pepper, scallions, and chopped cilantro. references: Title: Drunken Chicken, Ingredients: 1 (3 pound) whole chicken salt and pepper to taste 1 cup Dijon-style prepared mustard 8 fluid ounces beer 1/2 cup Italian-style salad dressing, Steps: Prepare an outdoor grill for medium heat. source: Title: 葱油饼, Ingredients: 面粉 葱叶 植物油 盐, Steps: 用刚烧开的水烫面，不要一次加太多水，先往里倒少许水，用筷子搅拌，不够再加，当面拌至一个一个小团时，边上还有一些干的面粉，就不要再加开水了，要加一点点凉水把面活好 活好的面团，放在面板上醒一醒，然后就把葱叶切成小丁，为葱花 把面团拉成长条状，分成相同大小的剂子，然后逐个团圆按扁 取一个面团用擀面棍擀成圆形饼皮，在饼皮上撒上盐盐多放些更香，用手抹匀 抹好盐再倒一些植物油，用小刷子涂满整张面皮 将葱花均匀地撒在已涂好的面皮上，然后把面皮包裹葱花从一端卷向另一端 将卷成条状的面再卷成圆形，然后压扁擀成扁平的圆形状饼皮即可 做好一个饼坯停下，这时需要把电饼铛内部上下都刷一层薄油并开始预热，然后再做两个饼坯，电饼铛也已准备好，放入饼坯合上盖子 三四分钟后就能闻到淡淡的饼香，打开盖将饼翻面再盖三分钟两面金黄即可出锅
references: Title: Scallion Pancakes , Ingredients: 1 cup vegetable shortening (crisco preferred) 3 cups scallions finely chopped 1 7/8 teaspoons granulated sugar 1 3/4 teaspoons salt 3 cups all purpose flour 8 ounces hot water 8 tablespoons peanut oil for frying, Steps: In a bowl combine shortening scallions salt and sugar. Mix into a paste. Refrigerate. Mound flour on work surface. Make a well and pour the hot water with one hand, using fingers of the other to mix. When all the water has been poured, knead mixture into dough.(if dough is too dry add anoother tablespoon water) Using a scraper pick up dough and continue to knead for 5 to 7 minutes, until smooth and elastic. Cover with damp cloth and allow to rest for 30 minutes. Divide dough into 4 equal pieces. On a lightly floured surface roll each piece into a 12 inch long roll 1 inch in diameter. Cut each roll into 2 1/2 inch pieces. With rolling pin roll each piece to a 10 by 4 inch rectangle with rounded edges. Spread 1 1/2 tablespoons of filling along center of dough. Fold both sides so they meet over the filling. Flatten gently. Fold in half lenghtwise and press again. Pick up dough by the ends and gently stretch it, hitting it gently on the work surface at the same time. Place the folded edge outward bring the left end to the middle creating a circle. Bring the right end around as far as possible to the left. Slip ends between folds of douugh and press gently. Press gently again so that the roll becomes a solid pancake. In a heavy skillet heat oil and fry pancakes on both sides until golden brown. Remove drain and serve immediately.
prediction: Title: Onion Biscuits, Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour 1 teaspoon baking powder 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg 1/4 cup cold butter, cut into small pieces 1 large egg, lightly beaten 1/2 cup milk 1/2 cup finely chopped onion 1/4 cup finely chopped green bell pepper 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, Steps: Preheat oven to 425°. Combine flour, baking powder, salt, nutmeg and butter in a large bowl; cut in butter with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Combine egg, milk, onion, green bell pepper, parsley and parsley in a small bowl; stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. Roll dough to 1/4-in. thickness; cut with a floured 2-1/2-in. biscuit cutter. Place biscuits, 2 in. apart, on an ungreased. Bake at 425° for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.

references: Title: Three-Cup Chicken, Ingredients: 1 chicken fresh, chopped into identical-sized parts 1 sesame oil scant cup black 1 soy sauce scant cup 1 chinese rice wine scant cup Hua Tiao, or COGNAC! 1 bulb garlic separated into individual cloves, skins on 3 slices old ginger 1 tablespoon rock sugar thumb size, or 2 fine sugar - a little more or less won't hurt 3 inches spring onions large bunches of, cut into 1 inch lengths 3 leaves basil julienned, Steps: Marinate chicken with soy, sesame oil and rice wine. At least for 6 hours, although overnight is best. Take the chill off the meat. Heat up some sesame oil in a wok or claypot until it is sizzling hot. Throw in garlic, ginger and spring onions. Fry briefly till fragrant. Add in chicken and sear. Keep stir-frying. Pour in the marinade liquid and the sugar. Continue to cook on medium. Once you have a rolling boil, cover the wok/claypot and let it simmer over a small flame, until all the liquid has disappeared and the chicken is on the cusp of burning. There should hardly be any gravy left. The chicken should be caramelised (charred at parts, even) and sizzling when served.

references: Title: Chicken Fried Rice, Ingredients: 1 c. diced, cooked chicken 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 c. uncooked long grain rice 1/4 c. canola oil 2 1/2 c. chicken broth 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1/4 c. thinly sliced celery 1 c. lightly steamed broccoli flowerets, Steps: Combine chicken and soy sauce; let stand 15 minutes. source: Title: 红烧肉, Ingredients: 500克五花肉 15克冰糖 2勺生抽 05勺老抽 2片姜 1根葱 5粒花椒 2片香叶 1勺米酒料酒, Steps: 五花肉切块，葱挽结，留一根葱叶切细丝最后留作点缀 五花肉放锅里干煸出油，到表面微微金黄色盛出备用 锅里剩下很多油，不喜油多的倒掉一部分，留一点底油放冰糖炒糖色，炒到棕红色把五花肉放进来 翻炒均匀后加入生抽一点点老抽 加入葱姜等调料，加黄酒100ml可不加加入少许水，转小火慢炖40分钟我用的珐琅锅锁水性比较好，所以加少许水即可，普通锅酌情增加水量 大火收汁，留点汤汁拌米饭 最后开盖大火收汁即可，放上葱丝
references: Title: Braised Pork Belly, Ingredients: 1/2 cup olive oil 5 pounds pork belly, cut into 6-inch pieces 1 can of your favorite beer 1 bunch celery, chopped 2 large yellow onions, chopped 2 medium carrots, chopped 20 cloves garlic, chopped 8 cups chicken stock or broth 2 tablespoon Szechuan peppercorns 10 sprigs fresh thyme 2 bay leaves Salt, Steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Heat 3 tablespoons of the oil in a large saute pan over medium-high heat. When the oil begins to smoke, carefully place one piece of pork in the saute pan and sear, turning once, until golden. Remove to a plate and repeat with the remaining pieces of pork. Set aside. Carefully add the beer to the drippings in the pan and cook, scraping up the cooked bits with a wooden spoon, until reduced. Heat the remaining 5 tablespoons of oil in a large flame-proof roasting pan over medium heat. Add the celery, onions, carrots, garlic and cook, stirring occasionally, until caramelized, 8 to 10 minutes. Add the pork to the roasting pan. Add the deglazed pan juices and enough chicken stock to cover the pork and vegetables. Add the peppercorns, thyme, bay leaves and 2 generous pinches of salt. Cover the pan with foil and braise for 3 hours. Remove the foil and roast 30 minutes more. This will allow the pork to gain a beautiful color and for the braising liquid to reduce. Let the pork cool in the braising liquid for 30 minutes to increase tenderness. Remove the pork from the roasting pan and strain the braising liquid. Refrigerate separately until ready to use. The pork can be served sliced or shredded.
prediction: Title: Pork Roast, Ingredients: 2 lb. pork roast 1/2 c. flour 1/2 c. water 1/2 c. vinegar 1/2 c. sugar 1 tsp. salt 1/2 tsp. pepper 1/4 tsp. paprika, Steps: Mix flour, water, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper and paprika together. Pour over roast. Bake at 350° for 1 hour.

source: Title: 椒盐虾, Ingredients: 1斤虾 10克椒盐 5克盐 5克胡椒粉 1勺五香粉 100克生粉 50克面粉, Steps: 面粉和生粉加水混合在一起搅拌，加入盐和胡椒粉五香粉一起搅拌均匀。 倒入洗净的虾，裹上浆糊。 热油炸起来，先炸一部分。 炸好再全部倒入锅中一起复炸一次捞起。 又脆又香还可以当零食吃哦 一蒸一炸的海鲜餐不用半个小时就搞定。
references: Title: Salt And Pepper Shrimp , Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds medium shrimp in shell 3 quarts corn oil 3 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon kosher salt, divided 2 large egg whites, at room temperature 30 minutes 1 cup cornstarch 3 tablespoons plus 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper (not fine) 2 cups sliced (1/8 inch thick) fresh jalapeno (about 8 chiles) 3 cups cilantro sprigs (from 2 bunches) 2 teaspoons flaky sea salt, such as Maldon, or to taste Equipment: a deep-fat thermometer, Steps: Cut shell along back of each shrimp with small kitchen shears (do not peel) and devein, then snip off legs. Heat oil to 400°F in an 8-to10-quart heavy pot. Toss shrimp with 1 tablespoon kosher salt and let stand 5 minutes. Rinse with cold water, then drain and pat dry. Meanwhile, pulse egg whites in a blender until watery, then put in a bowl. Stir together cornstarch, 3 tablespoons pepper, and 2 tablespoons kosher salt in another bowl. Toss half of shrimp with 1/2 teaspoon each of kosher salt and pepper in a third bowl; dip in egg white, letting excess drip off, then lightly dredge in cornstarch mixture, shaking off excess. (Coating should be as light as possible.) Fry until crisp and cooked through, 1 1/2 to 2 minutes. Transfer with a slotted spoon to paper towels to drain. Season, coat, and fry remaining shrimp. Reduce oil temperature to 375°F. Fry half of chiles with half of cilantro until cilantro just starts to turn dark green and chiles are wilted (do not brown chiles), about 30 seconds. Transfer with a slotted spoon to paper towels to drain. (Cilantro will crisp as it cools.) Repeat with remaining chiles and cilantro. Serve shrimp topped with fried chiles and cilantro and sprinkled with sea salt. Serve immediately.
prediction: Title: Pretzel Shrimp, Ingredients: 1 lb. shrimp, peeled and deveined 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine 1/2 c. finely chopped onion 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 2 Tbsp (heaping) minced fresh parsley 1 Tbsp. minced fresh dill or 1 tsp. dried dill weed 1/4 c. minced green onion 1/4 c. finely minced green pepper 1/4 c. dry bread crumbs 1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese, Steps: In a large skillet, saute shrimp in butter for 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Stir in onion, salt and pepper. Stir in parsley, dill, green onion and green pepper. Combine bread crumbs, Parmesan cheese and green onion in a small bowl. Stir into shrimp mixture. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.

source: Title: 糖醋鱼, Ingredients: 1只黄花鱼 1根葱 5片姜 8瓣蒜 2勺料酒 4勺生抽 3勺糖 4勺醋 适量干淀粉 2个剁椒 1小勺盐, Steps: 鱼处理干净，将两面鱼身各片开四五刀，沥干备用 用1勺料酒，2勺生抽，1小勺盐腌制10分钟左右 葱头切小段，葱尾切细丝，姜切丝，蒜剁成蒜蓉，剁椒切成薄片 调汁：在小碗中倒入1勺料酒，2勺生抽，4勺醋，3勺白糖，5勺清水搅拌均匀，另外再拿个碗用适量干淀粉和清水搅拌均匀 锅中放油，油温大火烧至180度，鱼裹上干淀粉，放入锅中后转小火炸至两面金黄盛出 锅中留少许底油，烧至五成热，改小火放入葱姜蒜爆香 倒入调好的料汁烧开 烹入淀粉水勾芡，如果太浓稠再加点清水，直至调整到自己满意的状态 起锅将芡汁淋到鱼身上
references: Title: Sweet And Sour Fish , Ingredients: 1 pound fish fillets, such as cod, haddock, or sea bass Marinade: 1 teaspoon salt 1 large egg white 1 tablespoon cornstarch Sauce: 1 cup chicken broth 1 tablespoon light soy sauce 1 tablespoon Chinese rice wine or dry sherry 2 tablespoons tomato paste 3 tablespoons rice vinegar, or red or white wine 3 tablespoons granulated sugar 1 tablespoon cornstarch mixed with 2 tablespoons water Other: 4 ounces mangetout (snow peas) 1 red bell pepper 1 tablespoon ginger, finely chopped 2 tablespoons green onions, chopped diagonally 2 - 4 cups oil for deep-frying, Steps: Rinse the fish fillets and pat dry. Cut into 2-inch squares. Add the fish to the marinade ingredients, using your fingers to mix in the ingredients and adding the cornstarch last. Marinate the fish for 15 minutes.  While the fish is marinating, prepare the sauce and vegetables. In a small bowl, mix together the chicken broth, soy sauce, rice wine or sherry, tomato paste, vinegar and sugar. In a separate small bowl, dissolve the cornstarch in the water.  Blanch the snow peas in boiling water until they turn bright green. Plunge briefly in cold water. Drain thoroughly. Cut the bell pepper in half, remove the seeds and cut into cubes.  Heat the oil to between 360 and 370 degrees Fahrenheit. Add the marinated fish cubes. Deep-fry until they are golden brown. Remove and drain on paper towels.  Remove all but 2 tablespoons oil from the wok. Add the ginger and green onion and stir-fry until aromatic (about 30 seconds). Add the snow peas. Stir fry for a minute and add the red bell peppers.  Push the vegetables up to the sides of the wok and add the sauce in the middle. Bring to a boil. Add the cornstarch and water mixture, stirring to thicken. Serve the fish on a platter, covered with the sweet and sour sauce and vegetables.
prediction: Title: Beer Battered Fish, Ingredients: 1/2 c. flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/4 c. oil 1 egg, beaten 1 c. beer 1/2 c. vinegar, Steps: Combine flour, salt and pepper. Heat oil in skillet. Stir in egg and beer. Cook over medium heat until thickened and bubbly. Stir in vinegar and cook until thickened.

source: Title: 叉烧包, Ingredients: 500克低筋面粉 150克糖 15克泡打 2克克塔塔粉 5克依士 50克澄面 50克牛奶 150克水 个蛋白 10克蛋糕油, Steps: 这样就可以蒸了 成功了
references: Title: Barbecue Pork On Buns, Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups water 1/4 cup vinegar 1/4 cup sugar 4 teaspoons mustard 2 teaspoons salt 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper 2 medium onions, finely chopped 1/4 cup butter 4 cups left-over pork roast, shredded 1 cup ketchup 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, Steps: In dutch oven, combine first nine ingredients. Summer uncovered 20 minutes. Add meat, ketchup and Worcestershire sauce. Simmer slowly 45 minutes. Serve on buns or french bread.
prediction: Title: Bacon Bites, Ingredients: 1 lb. bacon, cooked and crumbled 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. mayonnaise, Steps: Mix all ingredients together. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

source: Title: 家用叉烧酱, Ingredients: 叉烧汁, Steps: 叉烧汁：糖酱油玫瑰露酒芝麻酱花生酱盐13香姜蒜这些配料按照自己个人喜欢添加你会在制作中找到很多乐趣的。以上做法是家庭简单做法如果没烤箱可以拿来蒸一点要阉过夜这样子才入味千万不要炸因为糖粉足很容易就糊了。
references: Title: Chinese Barbecue Sauce, Ingredients: 5 -6 minced fresh garlic cloves 1 piece fresh ginger, minced 1 cup hoisin sauce 1/2 cup sherry wine 1/2 cup soy sauce (low-sodium works too-) 1/2 cup sugar 1/2 teaspoon Chinese five spice powder 3 teaspoons red food coloring, Steps: Mix all ingredients in a bowl,( or a jar with a tight fitting lid), until the sugar is dissolved. Refrigerate until you are ready to use it. *You can set aside some for use as a dipping sauce, but you must first bring it to a full rolling boil, over med. heat, then reduce the heat to low, and simmer until it is thick, and slightly reduced. **When you are ready to cook, marinate meat for 4-24 hours, turning once every two hours. You then grill or broil the meat until it is cooked through,(and slightly charred- this adds to the flavor!).
prediction: Title: Pizza Dip, Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened 1/2 c. mayonnaise 1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese 2 Tbsp. lemon juice 1/4 tsp. garlic powder 1/8 tsp. pepper, Steps: Combine cream cheese, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, garlic powder and pepper. Beat until smooth. Serve with chips.

source: Title: 叉烧包子, Ingredients: 500克高筋面粉 1小碗水 6克酵母粉 两勺奶粉 半勺泡打粉 3勺白糖 少许玉米油 2只鸡蛋清 1小勺蚝油 1勺淀粉 半勺酱油, Steps: 1先放入高筋面粉在碗里2一小碗温水倒入酵母、泡打粉、蛋清、奶粉、白糖进行搓揉3盖上保鲜膜进行发酵，天气热大概两个钟看到面团发涨就可以了，为了口感和营养加了好些料 发酵面团时可以制作叉烧了，偷偷告诉你们我买了现成的叉烧肉把叉烧切碎倒入酱油、蚝油、淀粉搅拌均匀即可做馅。毕竟是第一次做包子就先省一些时间啦，熟练后下回自己买肉来做叉烧咯 拿出发酵好的面团，放一些玉米油不让它粘手 揉成长条，撒一些干面粉在上面，搓揉时玉米油已经被吸收，干面粉可以把它们分离开，用刀切成均匀小块，用擀面杖把它们都弄成圆形像饺子皮 把擀好的面皮里放入叉烧，捏成像扇子一样把馅裹好即可，第一次包有点不堪入目呀这形状 小锅放入冷水，用纱布垫着包子，中火12分钟左右打开盖子看看包子变大就熟了，试蒸了一个来尝尝，还别说美味至极
references: Title: BBQ Pork, Ingredients: 4 -5 lbs pork shoulder 1 cup vinegar 2 onions, chopped 2 tablespoons salt 3 tablespoons crushed red pepper flakes 34 cup hot sauce 1 tablespoon sugar 2 tablespoons yellow mustard, Steps: Combine all ingredients except sugar and mustard in heavy pot. Add enough water to cover meat. Slowly cook until meat falls of the bone (approx 3 hours). Remove pork from pot and put in frying pan. Let simmer. Stir continuously until juice is absorbed. Cut/shred meat while in pan. Add sugar and mustard. NOTE: To save time I usually use a pressure cooker for the meat, instead of adding enough water to cover the meat, I add about 3 cups and cook at 10 lbs pressure for 50-60 minutes That time is from the time that the cooker comes to pressure. After it has cooled the meat has usually fallen completely off and the bone is clean, remove the bone then stir and simmer - if it tastes too vinegary to you, then add some more water and simmer it off. It's usually fine for me. Add the rest of the ingredients.
prediction: Title: Bacon-Stuffed Buns, Ingredients: 1 pkg. dry yeast 1/4 c. warm water (105~ to 115~) 1/4 c. sugar 1 Tbsp. salt 2 Tbsp. shortening 1 egg 1 c. all-purpose flour 1/2 c. milk 1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted, Steps: In a large bowl, dissolve yeast in warm water. Add sugar, salt, shortening and egg; beat until smooth. Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough. Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. Punch dough down. Turn onto a lightly floured surface; divide into 12 pieces. Roll each piece into a 12-inch circle. Place on a greased baking sheet. Let rise until doubled, about 30 minutes. Bake at 375° for 15 to 18 minutes or until golden brown. Remove from pans to wire racks to cool.

source: Title: 糖醋里脊, Ingredients: 200克猪里脊, Steps: 把里脊肉切成筷子粗细的丝。 面粉：生粉12加泡打粉。加水调好。可以用一个肉条试一下。然后醒粉15分钟。 用一个肉条试一下。然后醒粉15分钟。 面糊不掉就好 4成油炸熟。5成油复炸油翻小泡就是5层肉丝要用筷子捡一头。竖着下去。 炸好沥干 要炒的时候再5成油复炸 锅里留底油，加番茄沙司，一点水，糖，盐一点，味精，一点，白醋。最后放水淀粉勾芡。把里脊放进去翻炒两下就可以出盘了 装盘
references: Title: Sweet And Sour Pork, Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. lean pork, cut in 2 x 2 1/2-inch strips 1 (No. 2) can (2 1/2 c.) chunk pineapple 1/4 c. brown sugar 2 to 3 Tbsp. soy sauce 1/2 tsp. salt 1 small green pepper, cut in strips 1/4 c. thinly sliced onions 1 Tbsp. cornstarch 1 tsp. vinegar, Steps: Brown pork in a small amount of fat and 1/2 cup water. Simmer until tender. Drain pineapple (reserve juice). Combine sugar and cornstarch. Add pineapple juice, vinegar, soy sauce and salt. Add to pork and simmer until thick. Add pineapple, pepper and onion. Cook 2 to 3 minutes. Serve over rice.
prediction: Title: Rocky Road Shortbread Bars, Ingredients: 1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened 1/2 c. sugar 1/2 c. packed brown sugar 1/4 c. all-purpose flour 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. miniature marshmallows 1/2 c. chopped walnuts, Steps: Beat butter and sugars in large bowl with electric mixer on medium speed until light and fluffy. Add flour, vanilla and salt; mix well. Stir in marshmallows and walnuts. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 in. apart onto ungreased. Bake at 350° for 10 to 12 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool on wire racks.

source: Title: 拍黄瓜, Ingredients: 2根黄瓜 30克生抽 30克醋 15克糖 15克盐 5克辣椒油 5克花椒油 几瓣蒜, Steps: 先把黄瓜洗净，放在案板上。 准备一把菜刀，重重的从头到尾这样拍下去，来回拍两遍，你看黄瓜就已经裂开啦。 然后再切成容易入口的小块。既然叫拍黄瓜，就一定要这样用拍的，而不能是切的，拍了之后才容易拌入味。 接着来捣蒜，做凉菜是一定少不了蒜的，否则你肯定做不出来饭店那种味道的。把几瓣蒜放到蒜臼里，捣成蒜泥。我用的这个是大理石的，够重才好用。 再来调汁，生抽2大勺约30克，醋2大勺约30克，糖1大勺约15克，盐适量，辣椒油1小勺约5克，花椒油1勺约5克，再把捣好的蒜泥放进去，拌匀。关于拌黄瓜的料，其实你有什么都可以放进去，真的可以很随意的，不要拘泥吖。 把黄瓜和料汁倒在一起，拌匀，然后放到冰箱里冷藏20分钟再吃，味道刚刚好呀。 你做好了之后记得拍照给我，在微博上小羽私厨的桐小羽，我会选出棒棒的作品赠送小礼物呀。
references: Title: Chinese Cucumber Salad, Ingredients: 1 large cucumber, peeled 1/2 tsp. salt 1 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 Tbsp. wine vinegar 1 Tbsp. sugar 2 tsp. sesame oil, Steps: Cut cucumber in 1/2 lengthwise. Scoop out seeds and slice thinly. Sprinkle cucumber with salt and let stand about 30 minutes in a colander.
prediction: Title: Creamy Cucumbers, Ingredients: 1 cucumber, peeled, seeded and sliced 1/2 cup mayonnaise 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper, Steps: Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving.

source: Title: 鸡汤乌冬面, Ingredients: 鸡腿 乌冬面 鸡肉 香菇 姜片 葱, Steps: 鸡腿一只，斩成小块过沸水汆烫去血沫，捞出备用香菇几朵用温开水泡发洗净备用 锅中添足量水，加入鸡肉、香茹、姜片、葱、炖煮15-20分钟 加入乌冬面煮至软熟即可
references: Title: Chicken And Udon Noodle Soup, Ingredients: 1 None egg, lightly beaten 1 tbsp cornstarch 10.5 oz chicken breast, cut into strips 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 None small carrot, peeled, cut into thin matchsticks 1 tbsp light soy sauce 3.5 oz beansprouts, trimmed 14 oz udon noodles 2 oz miso paste, combined with 5 cups hot water 4 None spring onions, trimmed, cut thinly on a bias, Steps: Combine egg and cornstarch. Add chicken and toss to coat. Lightly coat a wok with oil. Stir-fry garlic and chicken over high heat for 4 mins, until golden. Add carrot and cook for 1 min. Add soy sauce and beansprouts. Cook for 1 min. Meanwhile, add noodles to miso soup mixture and cook according to package directions. Distribute between 4 serving bowls. Top with chicken mixture. Sprinkle with spring onions to serve.
prediction: Title: Noodles And Chicken Soup, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil 1 onion, chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon fresh ground black pepper 2 cups chicken broth 2 cups uncooked egg noodles 2 cups diced cooked chicken 1/2 cup sliced celery 1/2 cup chopped carrot 1/2 cup chopped green pepper 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, Steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in oregano, salt and pepper. Add broth, noodles, chicken, celery, carrots, green pepper and parsley. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 10 minutes or until noodles are tender.

source: Title: 凉拌海带丝, Ingredients: 500克海带 1勺鸡精 适量盐 3勺生抽 适量蚝油 3勺陈醋 适量香油 1个蒜 适量姜 适量小米辣 适量油, Steps: 海带泡发切丝备用 热水煮海带15到20分钟 用凉水冲冷，再用凉开水泡半个小时 姜蒜辣椒切好备用 锅里放油加入辣椒姜蒜炸香 海带控干水后加入以上配料，再倒入炸香的辣椒姜蒜油拌匀放冰箱一夜入味即可吃
references: Title: Seaweed Salad, Ingredients: 1 ounce dried red dulse seaweed 1 ounce dried green wakame seaweed 2 tablespoons rice-wine vinegar 2 teaspoons sugar 2 teaspoons grated ginger 1/2 teaspoon wasabi powder 2 teaspoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon roasted sesame oil Juice of 1 lime Sea salt, to taste 1 small carrot, peeled and sliced paper-thin 4 red radishes, thinly sliced 2 ounces daikon radish, peeled and thinly sliced 1 small cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced 1 firm-ripe avocado, sliced 1 teaspoon toasted white sesame seeds 1 teaspoon toasted black sesame seeds 2 teaspoons toasted pumpkin seeds 4 green onions, slivered, Steps: Put the dulse and wakame in a large bowl and cover with cold water. Let soak 5 to 10 minutes, until softened. Drain in a colander, pat dry and place in a serving bowl. To make the dressing, whisk together the rice vinegar, sugar, ginger, wasabi powder, soy sauce and sesame oil in a small bowl. Spoon half the dressing over the seaweed, add the lime juice and toss gently. Taste and add a small amount of salt if necessary. Surround the salad with the carrot, radish, daikon, cucumber and avocado. Season them lightly with salt and drizzle with the remaining dressing. Sprinkle the salad with the white and black sesame seeds, pumpkin seeds and green onions.
prediction: Title: Seafood Salad, Ingredients: 1/2 lb. crab meat 1/2 c. mayonnaise 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 Tbsp. lemon juice 1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1/4 c. water, Steps: Combine all ingredients and mix well. Pour into a greased baking dish. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

source: Title: 菠萝炒饭, Ingredients: 1根香肠 13个菠萝 1大碗米饭 20颗青豆 一点点洋葱 15根胡萝卜 2个鸡蛋 2勺生抽 15根黄瓜, Steps: 米饭乘出，打散，冰箱冷藏隔夜。不要用刚做好的米饭。这样做出来的你一粒一粒的 配料剩下来的 该洗洗，都切丁。 凤梨切丁盐水泡着。忽略我剩了好多自己吃的 鸡蛋放一点料酒和盐。搅匀。 鸡蛋下锅过一下，呈出备用。 锅底留油，先下香肠最好是腊肠，炒出香味，再把别的下下去，不用刻意留意顺序，洋葱稍微炒软一点就行。 放入米饭，搅拌均匀，倒入2勺生抽，看口味，可以放一点白糖。 总觉得吃这个要放点泰国的东西。哈哈哈哈。鱼露。一般泰国吃的还会放点椰浆 放入菠萝 撒上葱花，搅拌均匀即可 装盘出锅，开整。 光盘行动哈哈哈哈
references: Title: Pineapple Fried Rice , Ingredients: 1 14-ounce package extra-firm tofu, drained 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 pineapple, or 1 1/2 cup sliced pineapple 1 tablespoon canola oil 1 onion, thinly sliced sea salt 3 cloves garlic, minced 2 teaspoons curry power 1 teaspoon ground coriander 1 teaspoon chili-garlic sauce 3/4 cup cashews 1 carrot, peeled and shredded 1/2 cup frozen peas 1/2 cup raisins 3 cups cooked rice, preferably jasmine 1/4 cup vegetable broth, Steps: Preheat the oven to 324 degrees. Grease a small baking sheet.  Press the tofu in a paper towel to absorb the excess water. After pressing, cut the tofu into 1/2-inch cubes. IN a bowl, toss tofu with soy sauce until each cube is coated. Place in one layer on the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 45 minutes, turning the tofu a couple of times with a spatula. Remove from oven and set aside.  To prepare pineapple, cut in half lengthwise using a sharp knife. Remove the flesh and cut into bite-sized pieces. Set aside 1 1/2 cups for this recipe, and save the rest for another use.  In a large skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high heat and saute onions until soft and lightly browned. Season with salt. Add garlic, curry, coriander, and chili-garlic sauce, and let cook for a few more minutes. Add cashews, carrots, peas, raisins, rice, broth, pineapple, and tofu. Cook until heated through and adjust salt to taste.
prediction: Title: Pineapple Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 cups uncooked long-grain white rice 1/2 cup chopped onion 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper 1/2 cup chopped celery 1/2 cup chopped carrot 1/4 cup chopped green pepper 1 tablespoon minced garlic 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 teaspoon sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, Steps: Cook rice according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, saute the onion, bell pepper, celery, carrot, green pepper and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in the soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, salt and pepper. Add rice; toss to coat.

source: Title: 土豆炖牛肉, Ingredients: 土豆、牛腩、花椒、大料、香叶、盐、酱油、葱、姜, Steps: 牛腩切小块在沸水中焯去血沫，另起一锅烧热适量油，油温7成热时加入切好的葱姜片爆香，然后加入焯好的牛肉块大火快炒一下，同时加入酱油和料酒比例为21，接着加入些许热水，没过牛肉即可，最后将炒锅里的牛肉和汤汁一起倒入压力锅，再加入切好的土豆块，焖煮1小时就好啦。 我用的是电压力锅，所以时间需要长一些，普通压力锅应该最多40分钟就ok了。如果没有压力锅，要用普通锅煮1个半小时。。。单机的土豆要在最后的25分钟加。
references: Title: Beef Stew With Mashed Potatoes, Ingredients: 2 stalks celery, sliced 1 None large onion, cut into wedges 1 cup red wine 1 1/4 cups dried apricots, roughly chopped 1 None bay leaf 4 sprigs fresh oregano 2 tbsp olive oil 3 1/3 lb chuck steak, trimmed, cubed 3 tbsp flour, seasoned 3 cups beef stock 10 None button mushrooms 6 None large potatoes, peeled 1 cup milk 3 1/2 tbsp butter, Steps: Preheat to 325°F. Combine celery, onion, wine, apricots and herbs. Set aside 30 mins. Heat oil in a large Dutch oven over high heat. Dredge meat in flour, shaking off excess. Working in batches, brown meat for 3-4 mins. Set aside. Add wine mixture to pan and cook, stirring, for 2-3 min, until celery is tender. Return meat to pan and cook, stirring, for 1-2 mins. Add stock and bring to a boil. Cover then transfer to oven to braise for around 1 1/2 hours. Add mushrooms. Return to oven and cook, covered, for another 20-25 mins, until meat is tender. For mashed potatoes, boil potatoes in salted water for 20-25 mins, until tender. Drain and mash with milk and butter. Season and serve with beef stew.
prediction: Title: Beef Stew With Potatoes, Ingredients: 2 lb. beef stew meat, cut into 1-inch cubes 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 1 medium onion, chopped King Sooper's 1 lb For $0.99 thru 02/09 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 can (14-1/2 oz.) no-salt-added diced tomatoes, undrained 1/4 cup KRAFT Grated Parmesan Cheese 1/4 cup water 1/4 tsp. dried thyme leaves 1/2 tsp. ground red pepper, Steps: Heat oil in large skillet on medium heat. Add beef; cook and stir 5 min. or until browned. Add onions and garlic; cook and stir 3 min. or until onions are tender. Stir in tomatoes, cheese, water and thyme. Bring to boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, 10 min. or until meat is tender.

source: Title: 红豆汤, Ingredients: 适量红豆 适量米酒 适量带皮老姜, Steps: 姜切成丝，和红豆放入米酒中，搅匀浸泡8小时 浸泡好的红豆放入锅内，大火煮沸，搅拌一下，调成小火熬制30分钟。
references: Title: Red Bean Soup, Ingredients: 2 lb. dried red beans 1 1/4 lb. seasoning (baked ham) 1 1/4 c. chopped onion 1 c. thinly sliced shallots (scallions) 1/3 c. celery 3 Tbsp. minced fresh parsley 3 tsp. minced garlic 1/2 c. chopped green pepper 1 c. rice 2 large ham bones 4 qt. water 1 tsp. salt 3 bay leaves 1/2 tsp. black pepper 1/8 tsp. cayenne 1/2 tsp. red pepper pods, crushed 1/4 tsp. dried thyme, Steps: Soak red beans overnight in cold water to cover. When ready to cook, drain in colander and put them with the other ingredients into a heavy 8 to 10-quart pot or kettle. Bring to a boil over high heat, then lower heat and simmer for 5 hours. Turn off heat; remove ham bones and scoop out the pieces of ham. Strain the soup through a coarse sieve into a large bowl, mashing whole beans with a wooden spoon. Remove about 3/4 cup of bean solids from sieve and put them in bowl with ham. Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate for later use. Put the thick creamy soup back into pot and warm over low heat for about 5 minutes, stirring to keep it smooth. Serve piping hot over rice.
prediction: Title: Red Bean Soup, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil 1 large onion, chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon dried oregano 1 teaspoons dried basil 1 teaspooon dried thyme 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 2 cups red kidney beans, rinsed and drained 1 (14 1/2 ounce) can diced tomatoes, undrained 1 (15 ounce) can red kidney beans, un-drained 1 (14 ounce) can beef broth 1 cup water 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, Steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir until tender. Stir in oregano, basil, thyme, salt and pepper. Add beans, tomatoes, broth, water and parsley; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 30 minutes or until beans are tender. Remove from heat; let stand for 5 minutes. Stir in parsley.

source: Title: 豉油鸡, Ingredients: 一只清远鸡 蒸鱼鼓油 料酒, Steps: 鸡肉洗净砍对半待用 锅里放上次用剩的蒸鱼鼓油加上水，大概可以淹住鸡肉一半以上就好。 烧开了水放点料酒放入鸡肉，中火慢慢焖半个小时。 中途要给鸡翻面才好入味，最后大收汁，要是不急着吃可以泡一会更上色。 捞起鸡肉砍件，淋一点汁更好味道，剩下的汁水保存起来冷了冰速冻。
references: Title: Soy Sauce Chicken, Ingredients: 2 lb. chicken 2 cubes butter 2 c. soy sauce, Steps: Place cut up chicken into a baking pan. Melt butter and place over the chicken. Pour soy sauce over the chicken. Place in oven preheated at 350°. Cook for 1 hour. Excellent with white rice.
prediction: Title: Old Bay Seasoned Chicken, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil 1 tablespoon minced garlic 1 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme 1/2 cup dry white wine 1/2 cup chicken broth 1/2 cup heavy cream 1/4 cup chopped fresh parsley, Steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in red pepper flakes, thyme, wine, and broth; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer, uncovered, until liquid is reduced by half, about 15 minutes. Stir in cream and parsley.

source: Title: 牛肉炒面片, Ingredients: 400克面粉 200克牛肉 2个西红柿 半个洋葱 适量盐 3个鸡蛋 半个西葫芦 1个青椒, Steps: 青椒，西葫芦切丁，洋葱切丝。西红柿碎。买的牧标排酸牛肉。切丁，用生抽老抽料酒盐，13香，鸡蛋液，一点淀粉，抓起来，抓匀，腌10几分钟。揪片煮8成熟捞出过凉水备用。西红柿洋葱和蒜爆炒，放入西葫芦青椒丁，炒好的鸡蛋碎。放生抽老抽炒变色，倒入面片，拌匀放盐，小火炖2分钟入味即可
references: Title: Beef Chow Mein, Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak, cut into small chunks 6 to 8 small onions, chopped 1 stalk celery, chopped 2 cans mixed Chinese vegetables 1 small bottle lite soy sauce or to taste olive oil (for browning) 1/3 c. or more water (to cover bottom of pan), Steps: You will need 4-inch deep large frypan or pot.

references: Title: Hainanese Chicken Rice, Ingredients: 2 inches ginger freshly crushed 2 each scallions, spring or green onions including the green tops, bruised 1 tablespoon salt 1 whole chicken 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1000 grams chicken for the stock 3 inches schmaltz (chicken fat) 2 cups long grain rice white 1 tablespoon garlic finely chopped 1 teaspoon salt 2 1/4 cups chicken broth 2 inches ginger freshly peeled 1/2 teaspoon salt 2 each scallions, spring or green onions including 1 inch of the green tops, finely chopped 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 4 large hot chili peppers seeded 1 teaspoon sugar 1 pinch salt 1 teaspoon sesame oil 1/4 cup soy sauce, dark 4 cups chicken broth 1/2 each napa (Chinese) cabbage cored and sliced 1 x salt and black pepper to taste 1 each scallions, spring or green onions including 1 inch of the tender green tops, chopped 1 each cucumbers peeled and sliced 2 each tomatoes sliced 1 x cilantro fresh strips. for garnish, Steps: For the ginger-green onion sauce: Combine ginger & salt in a mortar and pound to a paste. Soy Sauce: 1/4 cup dark soy sauce Cabbage Soup: Pour the chicken stock into a saucepan over high heat, add the cabbage and cook for 2 minutes. Season with salt & pepper. Add the spring onions. 1 cucumber, peeled and sliced 2 tomatoes, sliced fresh coriander sprigs Garnish chicken with coriander sprigs
prediction: Title: Chinese Chicken Rice, Ingredients: 1 cup long grain white rice 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 tablespoon minced garlic 1 tablespoon chopped gingerroot 1 tablespoon grated fresh gingerroot 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1/4 teaspon ground black pepper 1/4 cup chopped green onion 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro 1/4 cup chopped roasted peanuts, Steps: Cook rice according to package directions. source: Title: 腰果鸡丁, Ingredients: 一个菜椒 一块鸡胸肉 200克腰果 少许盐 少许生粉 少许酱油, Steps: 鸡胸肉切丁，用生粉、酱油、油腌制10分钟 热锅倒入油，油要多点。接着放入腰果，炸，炸到你觉得可以哈哈哈哈哈哈哈，我是看它变成金黄色就捞起来了 腰果炸好后，捞起腰果，装出部分油，留些在锅里。接着倒入鸡丁翻炒，鸡丁变色后，放入菜椒和腰果翻炒，最后放盐调味。
references: Title: Cashew Chicken, Ingredients: 3 c. water (bring to a boil) 4 bouillon cubes (chicken) 3 Tbsp. soy sauce 2 Tbsp. cornstarch 3 to 4 chicken breasts, cut into bite size pieces salted cashews 1 bunch green onions 2 eggs, beaten 3/4 c. water flour and cornstarch, Steps: Dip chicken pieces in beaten eggs. source: Title: 酸辣汤, Ingredients: 1块嫩豆腐 1个西红柿 8朵木耳 3朵香菇 少许火腿肠 少许鸡腿菇 少许克盐 少许克糖 少许勺鸡精 看自己口味勺腊八醋 少许勺生抽 少许勺香油 少许香葱 少许根香菜 少许克玉米淀粉 少许克白胡椒 1个鸡蛋 1个浓汤宝, Steps: 所以食材洗净切好 起锅烧油下西红柿炒烂后觉得没什么颜色的可以加点番茄酱 后换小锅吧，炒好的西红柿和浓汤宝一个，放进去加入香菇木耳 开了后，放嫩豆腐，火腿丝，鸡腿菇，盐，鸡精，糖，生抽，白胡椒后开锅放玉米淀粉水 放打好的鸡蛋 放香菜，香葱，腊八醋，香油 今天还吃的水煮鱼片，下次有时间咱们来做这个菜谱
references: Title: Hot And Sour Soup, Ingredients: 8 c. chicken broth 1/4 lb. cooked, lean pork, shredded 2 thin slices ginger root 3 black mushrooms, soaked and shredded 1 oz. golden needles, soaked and halved 1/4 lb. tofu, cut into 1/4 x 1/4 x 2 inch strips 1/4 c. shredded bamboo shoots 2 Tbsp. wood ears or cloud ears, sliced 1/4 c. rice vinegar 1 tsp. black pepper 3/4 tsp. salt 1 tsp. sesame oil 3/4 tsp. sugar 1 Tbsp. thick soy sauce 1/4 c. cornstarch 3 Tbsp. water 2 eggs, lightly beaten shredded green onion, for garnish, Steps: Heat the broth to a boil. Add pork, ginger root, and black mushrooms. Cook for about 3 minutes. Remove ginger root. Add remaining ingredients except cornstarch, water, eggs, and green onions. Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes. Combine cornstarch with the water and stir until blended. Add to soup mixture and cook until thickened and clear. Remove from heat and slowly stir in beaten eggs. Garnish with green onions.

source: Title: 茶叶蛋, Ingredients: 10个鸡蛋 1小包茶叶 1段葱 3片姜 30粒花椒 5颗大料 4片香叶 30ml生抽 15ml老抽 5克糖 10克盐, Steps: 鸡蛋洗干净放锅里 清水没过鸡蛋，大火煮开，中小火8分钟 煮好后倒掉开水，迅速给鸡蛋冲凉，蛋皮冷却后你可以这样做：一手一个蛋互碰还可以这样做：擀面杖伺候，一顿敲鸡蛋外壳出裂纹为目的 锅中倒入清水，大火煮开，放入所有备好的香料 水再一次开时放盐、糖、生抽、老抽搅匀，小火煮十分钟 有人煮半小时以上，您看吧 关火，浸泡4小时以上，入味 直接睡了踏实泡了一夜 烂葱捡出去了 来一个吧
references: Title: Chinese Tea Eggs, Ingredients: 1/4 cup soy sauce 1 large eggs, Steps: Boil eggs until hardboiled. Remove from water and tap the shells with a spoon to create the cracks. Don't overdo it or else the shells will fall off! Return the eggs to water and add soy sauce, salt, tea, and spice pack. Add the soy sauce progressively, stop adding if the soup is too salty. The water will boil down and concentrate, so no need to be too aggressive. Simmer on low-medium for about 1 hour. Peel eggs and put eggs with "soup" in fridge for storage
prediction: Title: Tea Deviled Eggs, Ingredients: 6 hard-cooked eggs 1/4 cup soy sauce 1/4 cup water 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 teaspoon Chinese five-spice powder 1/2 teaspoon black pepper, Steps: Slice eggs in half lengthwise. Remove yolks and place in a small bowl. Mash yolks with a fork. Stir in soy sauce, water, sesame oil, five-spice, and pepper. Spoon mixture into egg white halves. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.

source: Title: 萝卜糕, Ingredients: 300克粘米粉 700克白萝卜 10克盐 8克糖 800克水 80克腊肉 40克虾干 6朵香菇 3个红葱头 适量胡椒粉, Steps: 萝卜一部分切丝，一部分切条。香菇泡软 腊肉虾干香菇红葱头切粒，放油炒香后倒萝卜进去一起炒软 粉盐糖胡椒粉全放进水里面，搅匀搅到糖融化，倒进炒萝卜的锅里，可以关火，倒完立刻搅拌，搅到粘稠了就可以盛到蒸盘里。大火蒸一个小时
references: Title: Turnip Cake, Ingredients: 1/2 lb rice flour (not glutinous rice flour) 2 medium turnips, skinned and shredded 3 Chinese sausage, diced or 3 slices ham, shredded 1 cup dry shrimp 5 dried Chinese mushrooms, soak in warm water,shredded or diced 1 teaspoon fried shallot, Steps: Cook shredded turnip with 1 cup of water for 5 minutes. Add some sugar if turnip is bitter. Heat 1 tspn of oil, stir fry Chinese sausage/ham, dry shrimp, mushrooms, shallots until done. Add black or white pepper if desired. Mix ingredients and rice flour with turnip. Add salt if desired. Note: this mixture should not be too thick. Turnip cake will turn hard if it is too thick. To steam: Choice (1) place step 5 mixture in a container and use steamer to steam for 50 minutes with high flame. Choice (2) If you do not have a steamer, use 8x8x2 baking pan. Cover baking pan with foil paper, pour in mixture. In a large deep pan, add water, position a bowl in center of pan, then, place baking pan on top of bowl. Put on lid and steam for 50 minutes with high flame. Chill turnip cake in room temperature. Slice cake into square or rectangular shape with a cleaver. Fry in pan with 1 tbspn of oil until golden brown on both sides. Sauce: Minced garlic and red chili pepper Mix with soy sauce, a drop of sesame oil and little bit of sugar. Ready to serve.

source: Title: 黑椒牛柳, Ingredients: 一块牛肉 一个洋葱 一勺淀粉 适量白糖 一勺料酒 适量盐 适量生抽 一个胡萝卜 一个青椒 一碗米饭, Steps: 各种翻炒，出锅。
references: Title: Black Pepper Chicken Stir-Fry, Ingredients: 1/2 cup reduced-sodium soy sauce 1 tablespoon honey 3/4 teaspoon coarsely ground pepper 3/4 teaspoon garlic powder 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric 1/2 teaspoon curry powder 1/2 cup cornstarch 1-1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cubed 1/4 cup canola oil, divided 1 large onion, chopped Minced fresh cilantro and thinly sliced green onions, Steps: In a small bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. source: Title: 回锅肉, Ingredients: 12块左右的肉五花肉 1只青椒 2勺郫县豆瓣酱 适量姜片 适量料酒 1勺糖 8粒左右花椒 少量鸡精, Steps: 选用肥瘦相间的五花肉，冷水冲干净后，锅里放水，加几片姜片、花椒、料酒与五花肉同煮，水烧开后再煮一会，用筷子戳一下没有血水就可以关火了，不用熟透的，待会还要烧了。 把煮过的五花肉取出用冷水冲干净沥干，用刀切成大小均匀的肉片待用。青椒切三角片待用。 锅烧热放底油，改小火，放入肉片用铲子划散。 加入料酒，煎到肉微微泛黄。 加入郫县豆瓣酱，改中火翻炒一下，再加入青椒片和一勺糖，翻炒一下。 青椒断生后关火，加入少量鸡精翻炒一下。鸡精不加也不要紧 出锅装盘，享用美食。
references: Title: Twice-Cooked Pork, Ingredients: 5 large leaves Cabbage 3 Green peppers 300 grams Pork belly slices 66 ml Katakuriko 1 clove each Ginger, garlic 1/2 tbsp Oyster sauce 1/4 tsp Doubanjiang 1/2 tsp Soy sauce 1 tsp Miso 1 tbsp Mirin 1 tbsp Sake 1 tbsp each Vegetable oil, sesame oil, Steps: Tear the cabbage and peppers into bite size pieces. Marinate the pork in a plastic bag with 2 tablespoons of sake and 1/2 teaspoon of soy sauce. Mix the ingredients marked with a together. Heat vegetable and sesame oil in a pan. Once it is starting to smoke, add the finely chopped ginger and garlic to the pan. Once it becomes fragrant, add the katakuriko coated pork. Heat vegetable and sesame oil in a pan. Once it is starting to smoke, add the finely chopped ginger and garlic to the pan. Once it becomes fragrant, add the flour coated pork. Lay the cabbage and peppers over the meat and cover for about two minutes, until the cabbages becomes tender. Add the seasonings and mix in to let the flavor absorb. Feel free to add salt and pepper to taste. That's all there is to it.
prediction: Title: Farfalle Recipe, Ingredients: 1 pound grnd beef 1/2 c. minced onion 1/2 c. finely minced celery 1/2 c. lowfat sour cream 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 2 c. uncooked farfalle pasta, Steps: Combine beef, onion, celery, and next 4 ingredients in a large skillet; cook over medium heat, stirring, till meat is browned and onion is tender.
