source: Title: 担担面, Ingredients: 猪肉馅 碎米芽菜 花椒面 葱 姜 蒜 辣椒粉 黄酒 酱油 鸡汤 酱油 香醋 白糖 芝麻酱 香油 水 辣椒红油 花椒油 细面 香葱碎 花生碎 青菜, Steps: 锅烧热后，倒适量油，烧热，煸炒肉馅，把肉末煸至干香 加适量花椒粉，炒香 倒入葱姜蒜末，翻炒出香味 倒入宜宾碎米芽菜，炒匀后烹入黄酒，再倒入适量酱油炒匀 加适量辣椒粉 煸炒至均匀干燥，肉酥粒就做好了，出锅备用 准备100克的酱油 20克的香醋 把酱油和香醋倒入锅内，加50克白糖，煮开 将煮好的调味汁晾凉备用 芝麻酱加一点点香油和适量水泄开 将芝麻酱搅匀 将汤锅的水烧开，下入细面 油菜烫熟 将1大勺煮好的调味汁、1大勺辣椒红油、1大勺芝麻酱放入碗内，加一点花椒油或花椒面 再加几勺开水或鸡汤，搅匀后，面汤底就做好了。俺喜欢汤少一点的。 放入煮好的细面，撒香葱末 放上烫好的油菜和肉酥芽菜、撒花生碎即可
references: Title: Dan Dan Noodles, Ingredients: 1 pound frozen fresh wide Chinese egg noodles, thawed 2 tablespoons canola oil 1/3 cup dry-roasted peanuts 3 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce 1 tablespoon sambal oelek (ground fresh chile paste) 1 teaspoon sugar 2 garlic cloves 1 (1/2-inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled 8 ounces lean ground pork 1/8 teaspoon salt 3 tablespoons fresh lime juice 3/4 cup thinly diagonally sliced green onions 1 1/4 cups chopped seeded peeled cucumber 1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro, Steps: Cook noodles in 6 quarts boiling water for 3 minutes. Drain in a colander over a bowl, reserving 3/4 cup cooking liquid. Place noodles in a large bowl. Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add peanuts to pan; saute 2 minutes or until fragrant. Remove from heat; cool slightly. Combine peanut mixture, soy sauce, and next 4 ingredients (through ginger) in a mini chopper; process until finely ground. Cook pork and salt in skillet over medium-high heat 8 minutes or until done, stirring to crumble. Add peanut mixture and 3/4 cup cooking liquid to pork; bring to a boil. Cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add pork mixture, juice, and onions to noodles; toss well. Place about 1 3/4 cup noodle mixture in each of 4 bowls; top each serving with 5 tablespoons cucumber and 1 tablespoon cilantro.
prediction: Title: Cod Noodles, Ingredients: 1 lb. lean ground beef 1 c. chopped onion 1 c. chopped green pepper 1 c. chopped celery 1 c. chopped carrots 1/2 c. chopped bean sprouts 1/2 c. soy sauce 1/4 tsp. garlic salt 1/4 qt. water 2 Tbsp. vinegar 1 Tbsp. sugar, Steps: Brown ground beef and onion. Stir in remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 30 minutes. Yields 6 servings.

source: Title: 红烧茄子, Ingredients: 1个茄子 1个西红柿 1个青椒, Steps: 洗净切滚刀，撒盐杀水十分钟不建议太久会抽巴 等待的时候，青椒、切块 杀水后用水冲一下再用厨房吸水纸擦干打一个鸡蛋裹上粘炸鸡粉个人感觉比生粉好吃 某宝买一个小的炸锅，不浪费油，注意炸茄子低温哦，表面黄就好了 晾的时候调个酱汁：蒜末、生抽、耗油、糖以上根据自己的口味定量郫县豆瓣酱、番茄酱这两个放一点一点点、最后放温水三勺 起锅烧油，、青椒下锅翻炒半分钟放料汁，炒出香味入锅，出锅前放鸡精提香
references: Title: Eggplant With Garlic Sauce, Ingredients: 3 tablespoons canola oil 4 Chinese eggplants, halved lengthwise and cut into 1 inch half moons 1 cup water 1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes 3 tablespoons garlic powder 5 teaspoons white sugar 1 teaspoon cornstarch 2 tablespoons light soy sauce 2 tablespoons oyster sauce, Steps: Heat the canola oil in a skillet over high heat. Cook and stir the eggplant until soft, about 4 minutes. Stir in the water, red pepper flakes, and garlic powder. Cover and simmer until all the water is absorbed. Meanwhile, mix sugar, cornstarch, soy sauce, and oyster sauce in a bowl until sugar and cornstarch have dissolved. Stir sauce into the eggplant, making sure to evenly coat the eggplant. Cook until the sauce has thickened.
prediction: Title: Eggplant Parmesan, Ingredients: 1 large eggplant, cut into 1/2-inch slices 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley 1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil 1 teaspoon chopped fresh oregano 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, Steps: Preheat oven to 400°. Arrange eggplant slices in a single layer on a baking sheet. Drizzle with 2 tablespoons oil; sprinkle with parsley, basil, oregano, salt and pepper. Bake at 425° for 15 minutes or until tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 5 minutes or until cheese is melted.

source: Title: 鱼香茄子, Ingredients: 1个茄子 蒜 葱 姜 1克盐 2勺糖 3勺醋 1勺豆瓣酱 2勺生抽 1勺老抽 1勺料酒 1勺淀粉, Steps: 干筷子放入油中有小气泡冒出差不多为四五成热 茄子切段，沾淀粉五成油温炸至表面金黄 豆瓣酱小火煸出红油 葱姜蒜末爆香，烹入料酒去酱料腥味 碗汁：盐1克、糖两勺满、生抽两勺、老抽一勺、醋三勺、淀粉一勺，拌匀收汁，碗中勺大小，豆瓣酱有咸味，其他有盐分要少些根据个人家中酱油盐咸度添加 将炸制好的茄子裹匀料汁出锅装盘
references: Title: Eggplant In Garlic And Tomato Sauce, Ingredients: 1 None eggplant, cut lengthwise into 1/3 inch slices, then widthwise into 1/3 inch strips 1/2 cup olive oil, plus 1 tbsp 1 None small onion, finely chopped 3 cloves garlic, minced 1 (13.5 oz) can chopped tomatoes 1 tbsp tomato paste 1 tbsp finely chopped fresh basil leaves 1/2 tsp sugar, Steps: Place eggplant in a colander and sprinkle with salt. Let stand for 30 mins then rinse under cold water. Pat dry with paper towels. Heat 1/4 cup oil in a large frying pan. Cook 1/2 the eggplant strips until browned all over and soft. Set aside. Repeat with another 1/4 cup oil and eggplant strips. Add remaining oil to pan and cook onion and garlic, stirring, until onion is soft. Add tomatoes, tomato paste, basil, sugar and 1/2 cup water. Season. Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer for 10 mins, or until sauce thickens. Add eggplant and mix until combined. Serve hot.
prediction: Title: Seafood Eggplant, Ingredients: 1 large eggplant, cut into 1/2-inch cubes 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 tablespoon minced garlic 1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1/4 teaspoon salt 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper 1/4 cup all-purpose flour 2 cups chicken broth 1/2 cup dry white wine 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, Steps: Preheat oven to 350°. In a small skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add eggplant; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl. Add garlic, rosemary, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper flakes; toss to coat. In a small bowl, combine flour and broth until smooth. Gradually add wine, stirring with a whisk until smooth. Stir in Parmesan cheese. Transfer to a shallow baking dish coated with cooking spray. Sprinkle with remaining 1/4 cup bread crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until golden brown, 20-25 minutes.

source: Title: 脆皮五花肉, Ingredients: 700g五花肉 半根大葱 适量花椒 1包卤料包 适量料酒, Steps: 将五花肉冷水下锅，锅里放适量的料酒、大葱、姜片、花椒，因为懒我放了一包卤料也可以自己放点八角这些代替卤料 开锅后关小火再煮510分钟左右 捞出放凉后用叉子扎孔 将盘子里面倒入适量白醋，将猪皮向下浸泡10分钟左右。 趁浸泡的空闲时间来调调料：3勺生抽、q勺五香粉、1勺孜然粉、半勺白糖、1勺蚝油 将肉划一下，将调料放上去，尽量不要沾到皮上了。肉划开是方便肉入味 用锡箔纸包好，将皮露出来，再刷一次白醋放进冰箱冷藏一晚上，不用盖保鲜膜 烤箱预热上220，下200。将肉放进烤箱中上层烤30分钟 切块加生菜哈哈
references: Title: Crispy Roasted Pork Belly, Ingredients: 1 (1 3/4-lb.) pork belly 1 teaspoon salt 1/2 teaspoon pepper 1 large onion, cut into wedges 2 celery ribs, coarsely chopped 2 carrots, coarsely chopped 4 garlic cloves, crushed 6 fresh thyme sprigs 2 bay leaves 1/2 cup chicken broth, Steps: Preheat oven to 325°. Make 1/4-inch-deep cuts in fattiest side of pork. Sprinkle pork with salt and pepper. Place in a large roasting pan. Place onion and next 5 ingredients around pork. Pour broth in pan, and cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake at 325° for 3 to 3 1/2 hours or until fork-tender. Remove pork from pan, and let stand 15 minutes. Discard vegetables and liquid in pan. Cook pork in a large cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat 8 to 10 minutes on each side or until browned and crisp.
prediction: Title: Creamy Crispy, Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. chopped parsley 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/4 c. butter or margarine, Steps: Brown meat and onion in butter. Stir in green pepper, parsley, salt and pepper. Pour over meat and onion. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

source: Title: 宫保虾仁, Ingredients: 食材 300克虾仁 10克手剥花生米 1个只用15克蛋清鸡蛋 10克盐 10克料酒 15克土豆淀粉 30克嫩葱段 5片姜 3瓣切片蒜 5个剪成段干辣椒 20个花椒 30毫升菜籽油橄榄油色拉油 调料 5克20克水土豆淀粉 15克糖 10克醋 5克辣椒面, Steps: 虾仁去虾线、备用。动妈这次用的虾仁没有黑线， 将虾仁洗净沥干后，放入盐10g、土豆淀粉一勺15克、料酒10克与蛋清15克拌匀，放在冰箱里腌制整24小时，让虾仁吸收调料，吃透上劲。 取炒锅，放入10毫升油，烧热，将花生米入油锅，炸酥成金黄色放置一旁备用。 再将其余20毫升油放入锅中，烧热，把姜，葱，蒜放入油锅炒香，干辣椒，花椒再下锅翻炒。 接着将虾仁下锅炒香，再将剩余调料搅拌均匀分别倒入锅内大火收汁收汁的意思就是大火使汤汁蒸发这一项不能觉得收不收汁都一样最后放进花生米翻炒即可。
references: Title: Kung Pao Shrimp, Ingredients: 1 cup chicken broth 2 tablespoons oyster sauce 1/2 - 1 teaspoon chili paste, depending on how hot you like it (like sambal oelek) 2 teaspoons cornstarch 1 tablespoon peanut oil 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 lb extra large shrimp, peeled and deveined 1/2 cup dry roasted peanuts 1 red bell pepper, chopped 3 garlic cloves, minced 1 tablespoon grated fresh ginger, Steps: Whisk together the broth, oyster sauce, chile paste, and cornstarch in a small bowl. Heat the peanut oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add shrimp and peanuts and cook, stirring, until the shrimp are just barely cooked (2 - 3 minutes). Transfer them to a plate. Heat the sesame oil in the skillet, and saute the bell pepper until just barely tender (about 3 minutes). Then add the garlic and ginger to the skillet with the bell peppers and cook, stirring, until fragrant (about 1 minute). Add the broth mixture to the pan with the pepper mixture. Bring to boil. When boiling, add the shrimp and peanuts and simmer until the sauce has thickened, about 1 minute. Make sure the shrimp are done (but not overcooked). Serve over rice or lo mein noodles.
prediction: Title: Duchess Shrimp Dip, Ingredients: 1 lb shrimp, peeled and deveined 2 tablespoons butter 1 tablespoon olive oil 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper 1/4 cup sour cream 1/4 cup mayonnaise 1 tablespoon lemon juice 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, Steps: In a large skillet, saute shrimp in butter and oil until shrimp turn pink. Stir in garlic salt, pepper, sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice and parsley. Serve with shrimp.

source: Title: 核桃酥, Ingredients: 100克低筋面粉 少许核桃 25克糖粉 2个蛋黄鸡蛋 60克黄油, Steps: 核桃锅里炒3分钟左右 擀面仗擀碎 低筋粉里加入融化后的黄油，一个蛋黄，核桃碎 拌匀揉一下，烤箱上下175度预热10分钟 切成16个小剂子 用手摁成一个个小圆饼，可以加点葡萄干之类的，我用了扁桃仁 每一个刷上一层蛋黄 放入烤箱，上下火175度15-20分钟，如果已经上色了，千万看住，别烤焦了
references: Title: English Walnut Cookies, Ingredients: 1/2 cup margarine 1 cup light brown sugar 1 egg 1/2 tsp. vanilla 1 3/4 cups unsifted flour 1/2 tsp. salt 1 pkg. walnut pieces 1/4 cup chopped maraschino cherries, Steps: Cream margarine and sugar. Add egg and vanilla; beat until smooth. Blend in flour, soda, and salt. Add walnuts and cherries. Form into a roll 2 1/2 inches wide. Wrap in wax paper; chill several hours. Cut into thin slices, about 1/8 inch thick. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 8-10 minutes until browned.
prediction: Title: Walnut Souffle, Ingredients: 1/2 c. walnuts, chopped 1/2 c. butter or margarine, softened 1/2 c. sugar 1 egg 1 tsp. vanilla 1/4 tsp. salt 1 c. flour 1/2 c. milk 1/2 tsp. baking powder, Steps: Preheat oven to 350°. Combine walnuts and butter. Press into a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.

source: Title: 香菇栗子鸡, Ingredients: 克板栗 朵香菇 只鸡腿 勺生抽 糖 盐 葱 蒜 香油 料酒, Steps: 原料 加工 焯水 熬糖 炒 添汤煮 加香菇 收汁调味 香菇栗子鸡 香菇栗子鸡 香菇栗子鸡
references: Title: Moo Goo Gai Pan, Ingredients: 4 chicken breast halves 4 Tbsp. olive oil 2 c. bamboo shoots 1 pkg. frozen pea pods, thawed 2 c. diced celery 1 c. Chinese cabbage 1 c. sliced water chestnuts 3 c. chicken broth 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 3 Tbsp. cornstarch 3 Tbsp. cold water, Steps: Cut chicken into strips. Fry over high heat in 4 tablespoons oil for 5 minutes. Add bamboo shoots, pea pods, celery, cabbage, water chestnuts, broth and soy. Cover pan and steam for 5 minutes over medium heat. Mix cornstarch with cold water. Add to Moo Goo Gai Pan to thicken. Serve with rice. Serves 4.
prediction: Title: Creamy Chestnut Chicken, Ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves (4 ounces each) 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 1/4 cup butter, cubed 1-1/2 cups sliced fresh mushrooms 1/2 cup chopped green onions 1/4 cup all-purpose flour 3/4 cup 2% reduced-fat milk 1 tablespoon minced fresh parsley 1 tablespoon butter or margarine, Steps: Place chicken in a greased 13x9-in. baking dish. In a small skillet, brown chicken in butter over medium heat until no longer pink; remove from pan. Stir in the flour, salt and pepper until blended. Add mushrooms and onions; cook and stir until mushrooms are tender. Stir in flour until blended. Gradually add milk, stirring until blended. Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Stir in parsley. Spoon over chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 40-45 minutes or until a thermometer reads 170°.

source: Title: 蜂蜜柠檬烤翅, Ingredients: 3个鸡根 1勺味极鲜酱油 1勺蚝油 3片柠檬切薄片 3瓣大蒜切片 最后适量涂抹蜂蜜 根据个人口味添加勺黑胡椒, Steps: 把翅根划开三刀，这样方便入味，也容易烤熟。 然后和调配好的酱汁蒜片一起腌制1小时。 把切好的柠檬薄片放在翅根上面，放入烤箱200加热20分钟后拿出来再表面层涂抹蜂蜜，再加热烤3分钟进行上色和最后的蜂蜜入味。
references: Title: Honey Soy Chicken Wings, Ingredients: 12 chicken wings 4 tablespoons soy sauce 1 garlic clove, crushed 3 tablespoons red wine (or sherry) 3 tablespoons olive oil 3 tablespoons honey, Steps: Cut tips off chicken and discard. Place wings in a non reactive shallow dish. In a small bowl combine remaining ingredients, and mix well. Refrigerate overnight, or a few hours. Cook on a lightly oiled bbq grill for about 5 minutes each side on a med-high heat. (Adjust cooking time depending on your bbq) or until chicken is tender and cooked through.
prediction: Title: Honey Garlic Chicken Wings, Ingredients: 2 lbs chicken wings 1/2 cup honey 1/4 cup soy sauce 1 tablespoon lemon juice 1 tablespoon garlic powder 1 teaspoon onion powder 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper, Steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with foil. Place chicken wings in a single layer in a single layer. Combine honey, soy sauce, lemon juice, garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Pour the honey mixture over the chicken wings. Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is cooked through, about 30 minutes.

source: Title: 珍珠丸子, Ingredients: 250克直接用绞肉也可以夹子肉盖板肉、五花肉都可以 2朵泡发干香菇 20克胡萝卜 3个去皮荸荠 2瓣蒜 5克姜 14茶匙胡椒粉 12茶匙盐 12茶匙糖 10克我用的海天金标生抽生抽 10克葱花 10克淀粉 一小把枸杞 150克请泡一小时以上，再沥干水份干糯米, Steps: 三瓣蒜掰掉硬头，放入小美主锅 设置2秒反转5，剥蒜皮 拿掉蒜皮，放入5克姜 2秒速度8，打碎姜蒜，用刮刀将锅壁的刮到锅底 放入三个去皮的荸荠、20克胡萝卜、2朵泡发好的干香菇挤干水分 设置3秒速度6打碎 清空主锅如果准备的已经绞好的绞肉就不需要清空主锅 绞250克肉末，如果买的肉馅就忽略，正确绞肉的方法参考我下厨房的方子链接httpswwwxiachufangcomrecipe104190109groupsharetitlea 250克绞肉、之前切好的胡萝卜荸荠香菇碎、14茶匙胡椒粉、12茶匙盐、12茶匙糖、10克生抽我用的海天金标生抽、10克淀粉提前用少许水化开、10克葱花全部放入主锅。 1分钟反转速度3，上劲 做成小丸子，滚上糯米，放入小美蒸锅组如果主锅是一大锅汤可以在下层铺烘培纸，如果不是请忽略烘培纸 开水上锅蒸25分钟，或者600克冷水上锅蒸30分钟左右，根据丸子的大小适当调整时间。蒸丸子时，取和丸子同样数量的枸杞，用温水泡软，丸子快结束前沥干泡好的枸杞。 蒸好请把蒸笼取下来，每个丸子顶部放上枸杞点缀一下。 趁热享用。
references: Title: Pearl Balls, Ingredients: 300 grams Minced pork 2 tablespoons water 1/2 teaspoon of salt 2 tablespoons coriander (cilantro) stalks, chopped 1 tablespoon sliced spring onions 1 teaspoon of grated fresh ginger Black pepper 1 cup glutinous rice 1 tablespoon cornstarch, Steps: Rinse the rice until the water runs clear and then soak for an hour. Remove, rinse and drain in a sieve. Spread the rice on a flat plate and pat with a paper towel to remove the excess water. Mix the pork with the water, wine, coriander, ginger, onions, salt and pepper and mix well to combine . Add the cornstarch and then mix. That's your filling all done. Using a teaspoon dipped in water, scoop up spoonfuls and roll into balls. When your meat balls are ready, roll them in the rice till they are completely coated. Prepare a steamer by lining with a damp cloth. Place the pearl balls in, about 2 cm apart Steam over high heat for half and hour Remove and serve. I served mine with a passata made with ginger and coriander, though the chinese typically serve them with soy sauce.
prediction: Title: Sweet And Sour Balls, Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1/4 c. minced celery 1 Tbsp. minced parsley 1 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce 1 egg, beaten 1 c. crushed corn flakes, Steps: Combine ground beef, onion, green pepper, celery, parsley, salt and pepper. Shape into 1-inch balls. Roll in corn flakes. Place on ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.

source: Title: 酱油炒饭, Ingredients: 熟米饭 海鲜酱油, Steps: 准备一大碗米饭，可以是剩饭，也可以现煮米饭，要煮的硬一点，放冷也可以放冰箱 锅里放沙拉油，放入米饭翻炒几下就放海鲜酱油，小火翻炒到上色均匀 可以适当的放喜欢的蔬菜。当然不放也很好吃
references: Title: Soy Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 Tbsp. cooking oil 3 beaten eggs 1 bunch green onions, sliced 14 oz. box Minute Rice, cooked (or 1 c. regular rice, cooked and drained) 2 Tbsp. soy sauce 1 c. cooked diced shrimp or 1 c. cooked diced pork, Steps: Heat oil. Add eggs, mixing constantly while breaking up with a fork. Add eggs and onions to rice with soy sauce to color rice brown. Add diced shrimp or pork. Blend very well and serve hot.
prediction: Title: Spicy Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 onion, finely chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1/2 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro 2 cups cooked white rice 1 cup frozen peas, thawed 1/2 cup chopped green bell pepper 1/4 cup chopped green onion 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon rice vinegar 1 tablespoon sesame oil, Steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir 5 minutes or until softened. Stir in cumin, crushed red pepper, cilantro, rice, peas, green onions, and soy sauce. Cook and stir 2 minutes or until rice is heated through.

source: Title: 红烧牛肉面, Ingredients: 500克牛肉 5-10个辣椒 1tbsp青花椒 3个八角 5片姜 2块桂皮 2tbsp豆瓣酱 3tbs酱油 1个洋葱 1tsp盐 3杯面粉 1杯水, Steps: 牛肉焯水撇去浮沫，用温热水将捞出的牛肉清洗干净，放在一旁待用 将干辣椒剪成小段放在碗里，用凉水泡半个小时，待干辣椒吸水舒展后，将液体滤掉，辣椒放在一旁待用 在炖锅中加油，小火煸炒辣椒和青花椒，4-5分钟后加入洋葱碎继续煸炒，直到洋葱呈半透明状，此时加入焯水后干净的牛肉，随后加入热水没过牛肉 此时，往锅里加入八角，桂皮，姜片，酱油，盐，和豆瓣酱，盖上锅盖，中大火待国内沸腾后转小火，煮两个小时 炖牛肉的同时开始和面，中筋面粉和水的比例31揉成面团状，盖上保鲜膜醒20分钟后，将面团擀成饼状，双面涂油后用保鲜膜覆盖放置一个半小时，面饼充分吸收油脂后回非常有弹性 一个半小时后，将面饼切成若干条状，双手轻轻一拉就能均匀拉长，随即放入沸腾锅煮面，过程中记得浇两次凉水使面熟的透彻 捞出面，炖锅里的牛肉也差不多了，汤勺捞出一勺牛肉一勺汤就可以开饭了。祝大家enjoy。
references: Title: Oriental Beef Noodle Soup, Ingredients: 6 cups water 2 tablespoons soy sauce 2 tablespoons chili sauce or ketchup 1 teaspoon ground ginger 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper 2 ounces ramen instant noodle soup, 3 ea. 2 1/2 cups chinese cabbage 3 carrots 1 cup mushrooms Small, sliced 1/2 cup frozen corn kernels 1/2 pound round steak Cooked, thinly sliced 4 green onions thinly sliced 2 teaspoons dark sesame oil, Steps: Mix water, soy sauce, shili sauce, ginger, pepper and one seasoning packet from the noodles in a large saucepan (reserve other packet for other use). Bring to a simmer; add cabbage and carrot; cook 5 minutes. Add mushrooms, corn and noodles; simmer 3 minutes. Add beef and green onion. Heat through. Stir in sesame oil. Note: cooked, chopped chicken may be used instead of beef.
prediction: Title: Roasted Beef And Noodles, Ingredients: 1 lb. beef, cut into 1-inch cubes 2 Tbsp. vegetable oil 2 cloves garlic, minced 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/2 c. sliced carrots 1/2 c. thinly sliced celery 1/4 c. sliced green pepper 1/4 c. chopped fresh parsley 1/4 c. soy sauce 1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes 1/2 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1/2 c. uncooked egg noodles, Steps: Preheat oven to 350°. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add beef; cook and stir until browned, about 5 minutes. Stir in garlic, onion, carrots, celery, green pepper, parsley, soy sauce, red pepper flakes and salt. Cook and stir until meat is no longer pink in center and vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes. Add egg noodles; toss to coat. Transfer to a 13 x 9-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, until heated through, about 30 minutes.

source: Title: 肥牛饭, Ingredients: 半斤肥牛 若干西兰花 半瓶矿泉水水 1勺蚝油 1碗米饭 2勺白糖 1勺料酒 1勺盐 2勺生抽 半颗洋葱 1根胡萝卜, Steps: 西蓝花和胡萝卜抄熟备用，肥牛用沸水快速抄一下变色即出，洋葱切丝备用，勾兑调料汁一勺盐，两勺糖，两勺生抽，一勺耗油，两勺淀粉，半瓶矿泉水，一点点黄油，一点点白胡椒粉。 平底锅烧热加底油洋葱下锅炒软迅速加入肥牛快速翻炒，加入勾兑汤汁翻炒均匀关火。 碗中把米饭打底，铺上西蓝花和胡萝卜，加入炒好的洋葱肥牛，淋上汤汁。 出锅，赛过吉野家的招牌牛肉饭。如果用日本酱油代替生抽更好味道。
references: Title: Beef Steak Rice Bowl, Ingredients: 1 slice Beef for a steak 1/2 Onion 1 clove Garlic 1 dash Salt 1 dash Black pepper 1 tbsp Vegetable oil 2 tbsp Soy sauce 2 tbsp Mirin 1 Hot cooked rice 1 dash Green onions or scallions, Steps: Take the beef out of the fridge. Slice the onion into your desired thickness. Cut the garlic into 5-6 slices. Make the sauce with the soy sauce and mirin. Sprinkle the beef with a small amount of salt and pepper. Saute the garlic in vegetable oil until it starts to brown, then remove from the pan. Add the meat. Take the meat out just before your desired doneness, and stir-fry the onion. Return the meat to the pan, and pour in the sauce. Coat both sides of the meat with the sauce, and take it out from the pan. Serve rice in a bowl, and put the onion on top. Leave the sauce in the pan. Slice the meat diagonally into strips, and serve on top. Pour the simmered sauce all over, and sprinkle with garlic and chopped green onions.
prediction: Title: Fat-Free Rice, Ingredients: 1 c. uncooked rice 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1/4 c. sliced green pepper 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, Steps: Cook rice according to package directions; drain. Saute onion and green pepper in butter in a large skillet until tender. Stir in rice, onion, green pepper, salt and pepper.

source: Title: 手擀面, Ingredients: 400克面粉 适量水 01克盐 一小把韭菜 两个鸡蛋 两勺或一勺生抽 适量酱油 各一勺味精鸡精 一勺香油, Steps: 400克面粉加 1克盐 放入适量的水，和成面团 在菜刀板上撒上面粉，防止它粘上去，擀面杖最好用大的，把它擀得比菜刀板还要大。 擀成菜刀板那样大的时候，把它叠成如图的长方形块块，用菜刀把它切成细条条 切成这样 切好之后，把它用手翻一翻，弄散就行，放到盘子或锅架上 把韭菜切碎，放入味精，鸡精，盐，酱油，生抽，香油 鸡蛋打碎放到锅里搅搅，捞出放入调料碗里，卤子就做好了 烧水下面 浇上卤子，这样就大功告成了
references: Title: Homemade Noodles, Ingredients: 2 to 3 c. flour 3 eggs 1 1/2 tsp. salt, Steps: Put flour in a deep narrow bowl (small mixing bowl). Make a well in the flour. Put the 3 eggs and salt in the well. Begin whipping with a fork. Gradually the eggs will pick up more and more of the flour. Keep whipping until you have a soft ball of dough. Dump onto well floured board. Knead more flour in until you have a stiff dough that is no longer sticky. Divide into 3 balls. Roll out about 1/8 inch thick, making sure your dough is well floured on top and bottom. Pick up and turn over (should be larger than a pie shell), then cut in 3 to 4 inch wide strips. Stack; flouring well between each strip. After they are all rolled and stacked, cut across stack to desired width of noodles (1/4 inch). Cook in large kettle of meat stock or just plain water that you add a teaspoon of salt and 2 tablespoons of oil to. Takes 20 to 30 minutes to cook.
prediction: Title: Homemade Noodles, Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 1/4 c. minced green pepper 2 Tbsp. minced parsley 1/4 tsp. salt 1/8 tsp. pepper 1 c. uncooked egg noodles, Steps: Brown ground beef and onion in skillet. Stir in green pepper, parsley, salt and pepper. Stir in egg noodles. Cover and simmer 10 minutes.

source: Title: 小米粥, Ingredients: 小米 清水, Steps: 锅里水烧开 接着倒入洗好的小米 大火烧开后小火慢炖 小火慢慢直至煮至小米粥浓稠即可。 一碗营养美味的小米粥出锅了
references: Title: Millet Porridge, Ingredients: 1/3 cup millet 3/4 cup water 1/2 cup skim milk or 1/2 cup soymilk 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon 1/2 teaspoon vanilla 1 pinch salt 2 tablespoons raisins (or more, to taste) honey or other artificial sweetener, to taste, Steps: In a small saucepan, combine millet, water, milk, cinnamon, vanilla, salt and raisins. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 25 minutes without stirring. If the liquid is not completely absorbed, cook for 3-5 minutes longer, partially covered. Remove from heat. Drizzle with maple syrup or honey. Serve.

Stir in rice and salt. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg.

source: Title: 狮子头, Ingredients: 瑶柱 松茸 猪肉 青菜 鲍鱼 生姜, Steps: 全家福 鸡蛋，淀粉，葱，姜末，猪肉搅碎，加入瑶柱，盐。混在一起 成一个圆 入油锅煎 热锅，最好用鸡汤。然后下其他东西 完美
references: Title: Lion'S Head Meatballs , Ingredients: 1 c. "lite" coconut milk 2 1/2 T. Reduced-sodium soy sauce 1 T. Curry powder 1 lb. lean ground pork or beef 1/2 c. Chopped scallions 1/4 c minced leeks, white and pale green part only. 2 T. Cornstarch 1 T. All-purpose flour 1 T. Toasted sesame seed oil 1 T. Finely chopped ginger 2 t. Seeded and minced fresh chile pepper 1/2 t. Salt 1/4 t. Ground white pepper 2 t. Extra virgin olive oil 1 medium head o rBoston or iceberg lettuce 1/4 c chopped fresh basil 1 T. Freshly grated lemon zest, Steps: Combine coconut milk, soy sauce, and curry powder in a large saucepan. Set aside. Place pork, scallions, leek, cornstarch, flour, seame oil, ginger, chile, salt and pepper in a large mixing bowl. Knead by hand until thoroughly combine and the mixture becomes sticky. Divide into 10 equal portions, about 1/4 c. each. Roll each portion into a ball.  Heat olive oil Ina large skillet over medium heat, swirling to coat the sides. Add meatballs and cook, turning occasionally until browned on all sides, 8 - 10 minutes. Transfer to a plate lined with paper towels.  Bring coconut milk mixture to a boil over medium heat. Add meatballs, co Ed, reduce heat to low and cook for 8 minutes.  Line serving bowl with lettuce leaves. Arrange the meatballs on top. Garnish with basil and lemon zest. Serve hot with the coconut milk sauce drizzled over the top or on the side for dipping.
prediction: Title: Lion'S Head, Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. minced green pepper 1/4 tsp. garlic salt 1/4 qt. water 1 Tbsp. soy sauce 1/4 c. peanut butter 1 Tbsp (heaping) cornstarch 2 Tbsp oil, Steps: Brown ground beef and onion. Stir in green pepper, garlic salt, water, soy sauce, peanut butter, cornstarch and oil. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Stir in meat mixture. Heat oil in wok or large skillet until hot. Add meat and stir-fry until meat is cooked through. Serves 4.

source: Title: 羊肉抓饭, Ingredients: 适量羊肉最好是羊羔肉 适量我用的两个胡萝卜 适量我用的一个洋葱 适量盐 适量大米, Steps: 第一步是泡米，提前30分钟把要用到的米用冷水浸泡 羊肉加入了适量的姜片冷水下锅煮 煮开后撇去第一道与第二道出来的泡沫，然后大火煮20分钟，直至羊肉可以用筷子轻松戳入 羊肉煮好后盛出并用温水冲一道，晾干 盛出羊肉后锅里剩余的羊汤也装好备用煮米饭 胡萝卜洋葱切丝备用 热锅倒入适量油，加入少量姜末，倒入羊肉翻炒，直至煸出香味 倒入洋葱继续翻炒，并加入适量盐所需盐的一小半 继续加入胡萝卜翻炒，并加入3至3勺羊汤熬煮 熬煮至看见少量橘黄色汤汁加入剩下的盐，准备起锅 泡好的大米与烹调好的羊肉一起搅拌均匀放入电饭锅，并加入适量的羊汤不需要在加额外的清水，所有煮饭的水以羊汤代替 电饭锅显示煮好后用大勺把米饭翻动均匀并加入适量黑胡椒粒，盛出即可享用
references: Title: Lamb Pilaf, Ingredients: 1 lb. lamb shoulder, cubed and rubbed with garlic 3 large onions, chopped 4 c. hot water salt and pepper 1 1/2 c. uncooked rice, Steps: Brown lamb and onions until very dark. Stir constantly. Place in a casserole with the seasonings, water and rice. Be sure to add salt for the rice. Cover and bake in a moderate oven until rice is cooked and water is absorbed.
prediction: Title: Lamb Fried Rice, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil 1 onion, finely chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1 teaspoons ground coriander 1/2 teaspoon turmeric 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1/4 teasp cayenne pepper 3/4 pound boneless lamb shoulder, cut into 1-inch cubes 1/2 cup dry white wine 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard 1 tablespoon chopped fresh cilantro, Steps: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic; saute until tender, about 5 minutes. Stir in cumin, coriander, turmeric, cayenne, and cayenne; cook 1 minute. Stir in lamb and wine; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low; simmer, uncovered, until lamb is tender, about 1 hour. Stir in mustard and cilantro.

source: Title: 糖醋排骨, Ingredients: 排骨 菠萝 苹果 白醋 番茄酱 料酒 生抽 老抽 熟白芝麻 淀粉 葱 姜 浓汤宝, Steps: 菠萝苹果去皮切小块，锅中放清水，熬煮至苹果菠萝熟烂，我是前一天晚上用电饭煲熬的 熬出的汤汁，放一汤匙番茄酱和3汤匙白醋醋量可以根据个人口味，喜欢酸的朋友可以多放一点，煮开做成酸甜汤备用 葱拍碎切段，姜切丝，排骨用清水焯一下，水一开马上捞起沥干 捞起的排骨放碗中加葱段姜丝，少许生抽、料酒、水淀粉一汤匙即可，不想要有着厚厚外衣的糖排腌制15分钟左右 锅中放油加热至9成，放入排骨 3秒钟后立即关火保证排骨的肉还是嫩的，用筷子翻动一下 捞起，用排骨表面的余油还可以继续加热一会儿 浓汤宝兑水一大碗，倒入锅中 放老抽生抽根据排骨的量按差不多1：15比例、少许盐 倒入事前做好的酸甜汤 加热，在煮沸前就可以下排骨了。你可以把熟烂的菠萝和苹果块一同放进去煮，吃的时候，你还可以吃到菠萝粒哦苹果一般都会完全化掉 盖上锅盖，大火煮开，水分汤汁耗去一半的时候，转小火炖至汤汁稠，出锅前撒上白芝麻即可
references: Title: Sweet And Sour Ribs, Ingredients: 4 lb. pork spareribs, cut in portions 1/3 c. brown sugar 3 Tbsp. cornstarch 1/2 tsp. dry mustard 1/8 tsp. ginger 1 tsp. salt 1 tsp. chili powder 1 clove garlic 1/3 c. vinegar 1 1/2 c. tomato juice 1 c. water 2 tsp. soy sauce 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce, Steps: Wipe ribs with a damp paper towel. Bake on rack in shallow pan at 450° for 35 minutes. Combine remaining ingredients in pot and cook until slightly thickened. Remove rack from roasting pan; drain grease. Put ribs in bottom of pan; pour sauce over ribs. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 1 1/2 hours at 350°.
prediction: Title: Sweet & Sour Ribs, Ingredients: 2 lbs pork back ribs, cut into 1 inch cubes 1 tablespoon salt 1 tablespoon pepper 1 tablespoon garlic powder 1 tablespoon onion powder 1 teaspoon paprika 1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper 1/4 teaspoon dried thyme 1/4 teaseasoned salt 1/4 cup water 1 tablespoon vinegar 1 tablespoon soy sauce 1 tablespoon cornstarch 1 tablespoon water, Steps: In a large skillet, brown the ribs in the salted oil over medium heat. Add the onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, cayenne pepper, thyme, salt, and water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 30 minutes. Stir in the vinegar, soy sauce, and cornstarch. Return the ribs to the skillet and simmer, covered, for 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and let stand for 5 minutes before serving.

source: Title: 台湾版盐酥鸡, Ingredients: 2只鸡腿 适量五香粉 1勺料酒 1勺胡椒粉 适量盐 2根葱 4瓣切末蒜头 3片姜 1勺酱油 半勺玉米淀粉 一碗4勺地瓜淀粉 4勺面粉 1把九层塔, Steps: 鸡腿去骨留皮，切小块，多洗几次，去腥。 下酱油，玉米淀粉，胡椒粉，五香粉，盐，蒜末，姜，葱，料酒腌制2个钟头。 4勺面粉，4勺地瓜淀粉，10勺水，半勺五香粉，一点点盐，调成面糊。再准备一碗地瓜淀粉。腌制好的鸡腿肉块，粘一边面糊，再沾上地瓜淀粉，下到油锅里小火炸。 准备炸。 炸到7分熟，捞起来放凉。 凉后再入锅重炸。这样才会外焦里嫩，更加好吃。必须炸两次哦，不然口感会差很多。九层塔过油后就可以了。味道独特 重炸后，放到吸油纸上，撒上椒盐，开动啦 开动
references: Title: Fried Chicken, Ingredients: 1 cut up chicken 1 c. flour 1 tsp. paprika 1 tsp. dry mustard 1/4 tsp. nutmeg 1/2 tsp. garlic powder 2 tsp. salt 1 tsp. pepper, Steps: Mix all ingredients together in plastic bag and shake well. Coat chicken well and fry in deep fat until well cooked. Especially good for a picnic.
prediction: Title: Asian Chicken Souffle, Ingredients: 4 boneless skinless chicken breast halves 2 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon rice vinegar 1 tablespoon sesame oil 1 teaspoon sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger 1/8 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, Steps: In a small bowl, combine the soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, salt, ginger, and crushed red pepper; mix well. Place the chicken in a zip-top plastic bag; seal bag and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or up to 24 hours. Preheat the oven to 375°. Remove the chicken from the bag; discard the marinade. Place the bag in a single layer on a baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes or until the chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear when pierced with a fork.

source: Title: 脆皮日本豆腐, Ingredients: 3条日本豆腐 30克洋葱 2个香菇 20克胡萝卜 2瓣蒜 一碗淀粉 15克生抽 8克耗油 6克白糖 1克盐 1克鸡精 50克水淀粉, Steps: 干香菇泡发，嫌麻烦的用新鲜的就好。 日本豆腐连包装中间切一刀，去掉外包装，在均匀切块。动作温柔点。 豆腐均匀的裹上淀粉。 锅里放油，七成热的时候放入豆腐块，仍然是温柔点，每个豆腐间大一点，粘连就废了 炸好的豆腐，豆腐要多炸一会，表皮脆脆的内里仍然软软的， 配菜：洋葱，胡萝卜，香菇通通切丁，锅烧热倒油，一起扔进去。 配菜炒熟后放入豆腐，如果炸的好，其实是不怕翻的。稍微温柔点就可以。 倒入所有料汁生抽，耗油，盐，糖，鸡精 最后水淀粉勾芡，关火。水要多一些，有汤汁才好吃。 开动吧
references: Title: Crispy Fried Tofu, Ingredients: 1/2 cup mirin 1/2 cup soy sauce 1 1/2 teaspoons fresh lime juice 1 1/2 teaspoons fresh clementine or orange juice Two 14-ounce packages extra-firm tofu, drained well and cut into 8 rectangles each 3 cups rice flour, for breading 2 large eggs, for breading 2 cups milk, for breading 2 cups panko, for breading Vegetable oil, for frying Kosher salt 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 small onion, thinly sliced 2 garlic cloves, sliced 1/4 cup dark brown sugar 5 black plums, thinly sliced 1 tablespoon tamarind paste 1 teaspoon Sriracha Salt, Steps: Make the Tofu In a baking dish, whisk the mirin, soy, lime juice, clementine juice and 1/4 cup of water. Add the tofu and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 2 to 4 hours, turning once; pat dry. Meanwhile, Make the Plum Sauce In a saucepan, heat the vegetable oil. Cook the onion and garlic over moderate heat, stirring, until the onion starts to brown. Add dark brown sugar, black plums and tamarind paste. Cook, stirring, until soft, about 12 minutes; let cool. Transfer sauce to a blender and pulse with Sriracha until nearly smooth. Season with salt and set aside. Meanwhile, Make the Plum Sauce In a shallow dish, spread 1 cup of the rice flour. In another shallow dish, whisk the eggs with the milk and the remaining 2 cups of rice flour. Spread the panko in a third shallow dish. Dredge the tofu in the flour, the egg mixture and then the panko, lightly patting the coating to help it adhere. Meanwhile, Make the Plum Sauce In a large saucepan, heat 1 1/2 inches of oil to 325. Fry the coated tofu in batches, turning, until deep golden, 7 minutes. Transfer to paper towels to drain and season with salt. Serve hot, with the Plum Sauce.

source: Title: 辣椒小炒肉, Ingredients: 克五花肉40 勺豆豉10 勺料酒1 勺酱油数 瓣蒜3 勺, Steps: 肉切好放酱油腌制一下 首先把肉先随便炒一下，盛起来待用 倒入蒜，豆鼓，辣椒小炒 蒜豆鼓 辣椒 最好把肉倒入辣椒中翻炒均匀加入酱油调味 开胃爽口辣椒炒肉好啦
references: Title: Pork And Pepper Stir Fry, Ingredients: 2 tsp canola oil 1 lb pork tenderloin, sliced 1 None red pepper, seeded, sliced 1 tsp cumin seeds, roughly crushed 2 cloves garlic, minced 1 bunch green onions, sliced into 1 inch pieces 1 tsp sesame oil 8 oz broccoli florets, blanched in boiling water for 1-2 mins, drained 1 tbsp sweet chili sauce 4 tbsp light soy sauce 8-10 None fresh cilantro leaves 8-10 None fresh basil leaves 8 oz rice noodles, softened in boiling water for 2-3 mins, drained, Steps: Heat oil in a wok or frying pan. references: Title: Honey Dijon glazed ribs, Ingredients: 3 -4 lbs pork back ribs 1 teaspoon mustard seeds 1 cooking onion, chopped 14 cup apple cider vinegar 1 stalk celery, chopped 1 bay leaf 1 teaspoon peppercorn, cracked 1 cup honey dijon mustard, Steps: In a pot large enough to hold the ribs, add the mustard seed, onion, vinegar, celery, bay leaf, peppercorns and enough water to cover. source: Title: 酸汤水饺, Ingredients: 适量水饺 2勺山西醋 1勺酱油 1勺香油 2勺辣子 1根香菜 1根葱, Steps: 准备材料的过程煮水，水开下速冻饺子 把所有的材料备好装大碗，吃面吃水饺必备的大碗，食材缺一不可，否则味道就不是这样的了，具体分量视个人喜好决定 注意扑锅，水开加两回冷水基本也就熟了 确认熟透直接倒入碗里 搅拌均匀开吃，超爽啊
references: Title: Chicken Dumpling Soup, Ingredients: stewing chicken 1 sm., or hen 2 onions diced 1 parsley root cream in color, carrot-like 6 carrots 3 stalks celery 2 bunches fresh parsley diced 1/2 cup water 1/2 cup milk 2 eggs salt flour, Steps: Cut up chicken (hen) into parts and rinse well. Cover chicken with water; go 1 inch over top of chicken. Bring to a boil. Once at a rapid boil, spoon off cream-colored residue and add the diced onion. Cook for 2 hours. Put in the parsley root (cut it as you would carrots) and the carrots, celery and diced parsley. Add 2 tablespoon salt. Cook 1 hour. Mix milk and water; add to eggs and add a little salt. Add flour until mixture does not fall off your spoon. It will be a thick, gooey mixture! 1/2 teaspoon makes 1 dumpling. Put in a pot of boiling water. Only fill pot approximately 1/2 full since these dumplings take up a lot of room. Cook dumplings for 45 minutes. Lid on pot should be tipped. Add dumplings to chicken soup and enjoy!
prediction: Title: Hot & Sour Dumplings, Ingredients: 2 tablespoons vegetable oil 1 large onion, chopped 2 garlic cloves, minced 1 tablespoon minced fresh gingerroot 1 teaspoon ground cumin 1/2 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 2 cups chicken broth 2 cups water 2 cups cubed peeled potatoes 1 cup sliced carrot 1 cup sliced celery 1/2 cup sliced green onions 1/2 cup thinly sliced green onion 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, Steps: Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook and stir 5 minutes or until tender. Stir in ginger, cumin, salt and pepper. Stir in broth, potatoes, carrots, celery, green onions and cilantro. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. Stir into soup. Sprinkle with green onions.

source: Title: 香辣牛肉面, Ingredients: 二斤牛腩 三只番茄 若干葱姜蒜 除了花椒一小撮，其他各一个草果，大料，花椒，桂皮 一汤勺郫县豆瓣酱 两汤勺番茄酱 一小把冰糖 若干老抽生抽料酒, Steps: 牛腩切块焯水。表面杂质略干净，高汤留出备用。 另起锅，适量油，下入葱姜蒜，大料花椒草果爆香。接着下入郫县豆瓣酱，炒出红油，加入牛腩块翻炒。 牛肉煸炒微黄加入老抽，生抽，料酒翻炒均匀 加入番茄块，番茄酱，冰糖翻炒几下，连同之前的高汤一起倒入高压锅，上气小火压40分钟。 最后开盖放盐，大火收汁。吃面的话略微多一点汤，不要收的太浓稠 最后就是煮面条啦，来一个面碗，舀上几勺牛肉汤，把煮好的面条放进去，加一勺面汤，再来一勺牛肉，来点配菜或者香菜，开动吧
references: Title: Spicy Chicken Noodle Soup, Ingredients: 3 Chicken thigh fillet 3 medium potatoes, washed 2 medium carrots, sliced 3 Rasher bacon, diced 1 medium brown onion, chopped 2 Celery stalks, sliced 3/4 cup Peas and corn 2 tsp Ground cumin 2 tsp Ground coriander 1/4 tsp Cayenne pepper 1 tsp Turmeric 2 tbsp Chopped parsley 2 Litres Chicken stock 1 pack 2 min noodles, crushed 1 Salt & pepper to taste, Steps: Coat chicken in parsley, cumin, coriander, cayenne and turmeric. Cover and place in fridge while you prepare your veges. In a large non stick pot, fry onion and bacon and set aside. Brown chicken and set aside. Now add stock, potatoes, carrot, celery and bacon and onion. Bring to boil and simmer until veges have softened. Chop chicken 2cm pieces and throw into soup along with peas and corn and noodle. Cook until chicken is finished cooking through and noodles are soft. Salt and pepper to serve. So easy, so very tasty. Enjoy!
prediction: Title: Spicy Beef Noodles, Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef 1/2 c. chopped onion 1/4 c. chopped green pepper 2 Tbsp. minced green pepper 1 clove garlic, minced 1/2 tsp. salt 1/4 tsp. pepper 1 (8 oz.) pkg. egg noodles, uncooked, Steps: Cook beef in large skillet until no longer pink; drain. Stir in onion, green pepper, garlic, salt and pepper. Reduce heat; cover and simmer 5 minutes. Stir in egg noodles. Cover and simmer 10 minutes or until noodles are tender.
